Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: When the governors learned that Arthur Weasley's daughter was taken into the Chamber, they saw fit to summon me back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ridiculous!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Curiously, Lucius, several of them were under the impression that you would curse their families, if they did not agree to suspend me in the first place.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: How dare you?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I beg your pardon?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: My sole concern has always been, and will always be, the welfare of this school and, of course, its students. The culprit has been identified, I presume?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: And? Who was it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Only, this time, he chose to act through somebody else, by means of this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I see.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Fortunately, our young Mr. Potter discovered it. One hopes that no more of Lord Voldemort's old school things should find their way into innocent hands. The consequences for the one responsible would be severe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, let us hope that Mr. Potter will always be around to save the day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry. I will be.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore. Come, Dobby. We're leaving.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahh! Oow!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Sir, I wonder if I could have that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Malfoy! Mr. Malfoy! I have something of yours.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Mine? I don't know what you're talking about.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I think you do, sir. I think you slipped the diary into Ginny Weasley's cauldron, that day at Diagon Alley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You do, do you? Why don't you prove it? Come, Dobby. Dobby!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Open it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Master has given Dobby a sock!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What? I didn't give.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Master has presented Dobby with clothes! Dobby is free!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You've lost me my servant!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You shall not harm Harry Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Advada.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Your parents were meddlesome fools, too. You mark my words, Potter, one day soon you are going to meet the same sticky end!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter freed Dobby! How can Dobby ever repay him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Just promise me something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Anything, sir!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Never try to save my life again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Welcome back, Sir Nicholas!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thank you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good evening, Sir Nicholas!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good evening!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good to see you, Sir Nicholas!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thank you! Hello! Hermione! Welcome back!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thanks, Sir Nicholas!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry- it's Hermione!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uhh-um… Welcome back, Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's good to be back! Congratulations! I can't believe you solved it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, we had loads of help from you. We couldn't have done it without you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Could I have your attention, please?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Before we begin the feast, let us have a round of applause for Professor Sprout and Madame Pomfrey, whose Mandrake juice has been so successfully administered to all who had been Petrified. Also, in light of the recent events, as a school treat, all exams have been canceled.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, no!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Sorry I'm late! The owl that delivered my release papers got all lost and confused. Some ruddy bird called Errol. And I'd just like to say that aif it hadn't been for you, Harry, and Ron, and Hermione, o' course, I woulduh- I'd still be you-know-where, so I- I'd just like to say 'Thanks.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, there's no Hogwarts without you, Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yeah! Yeah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Harry! Harry, open the door! Marge! How lovely to see...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

Fortunately, I'm delighted to announce... that his place will be taken by none other... than our own Rubeus Hagrid. Finally, on a more disquieting note... at the request of the Ministry of Magic... Hogwarts will, until further notice, play host to the dementors of Azkaban... until such a time as Sirius Black is captured. The dementors will be stationed at every entrance to the grounds. Now whilst I've been assured... that their presence will not disrupt our day-to-day activities... a word of caution. Dementors are vicious creatures. They'll not distinguish... between the one they hunt and the one who gets in their way. Therefore, I must warn each and every one of you... to give them no reason to harm you. It is not in the nature of a dementor to be forgiving. But you know, happiness can be found... even in the darkest of times... if one only remembers to turn on the light.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You don't think that Grim thing's got anything to do with Sirius Black?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, honestly, Ron. If you ask me, Divination's a woolly discipline. Now, Ancient Runes, that's a fascinating subject.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ancient Runes? Exactly how many classes are you taking?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: A fair few.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hang on. That's not possible. Ancient Runes is in the same time as Divination. You have to be in two classes at once.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Don't be silly Ron. How could anyone be in two classes at once? Broaden your minds. Use your Inner Eye to see the future!.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's it. Come on, now. Come closer. Less talking, if you don't mind. I got a real treat for you today. A great lesson. So follow me. Right, you lot. Less chattering. Form a group over there. And open your books to page 49.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Exactly how do we do that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Just stroke the spine, of course. Goodness me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Don't be such a wimp, Longbottom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm okay. Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I think they're funny.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, yeah. Terribly funny. Really Witty. God, this place has gone to the dogs. Wait until Father hears Dumbledore's got this oaf teaching classes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Shut up, Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: D-Dementor! Dementor!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Just ignore him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You're supposed to stroke it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Isn't he beautiful? Say hello to Buckbeak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid, exactly what is that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That, Ron, is a hippogriff. First thing you wanna know about hippogriffs is that they're very proud creatures. Very easily offended. You do not want to insult a hippogriff. It may just be the last thing you ever do. Now, who'd like to come and say hello? Well done, Harry. Well done. Come on now. Now... you have to let him make the first move. It's only polite. So... step up. Give him a nice bow. Then you wait and see if he bows back. If he does, you can go and touch him. If not... Well, we'll get to that later. Just make your bow. Nice and low. Back off, Harry. Back off. Keep still. Keep still. Well done, Harry. Well done. Here, you big brute, you. Right. I think you can go and pat him now. Go on. Don't be shy. Nice and slow, now. Nice and slow. Slow. Not so fast, Harry. Slow down, Harry. That's it... Nice and slow. Now let him come to you. Slowly, now, slowly, slowly... That's it... Yes! Well done! Well done, Harry, well done! I think he may let you ride him now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hey, hey, hey!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Put you over here, just behind the wing joint. Don't pull out any of his feathers, because he won't thank you for that. Well done, Harry, and well done, Buckbeak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That was wicked, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well done, well done. How am I doing me first day?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Brilliant, professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes you're not dangerous at all, are you, you great ugly brute!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Malfoy, no... No! Buckbeak! Whoa, whoa, whoa... Whoa! Buckbeak! Away, you silly creature!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's killed me! It's killed me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Calm down! It's just a scratch!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid! He has to be taken to the hospital.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm the teacher. I'll do it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh You're gonna regret this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Class dismissed!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You and your bloody chicken!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Does it hurt terribly, Draco?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It comes and it goes. Still, I consider myself lucky. Madam Pomfrey said another minute and I could've lost my arm. I couldn't do homework for weeks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Listen to the idiot. He's really laying it on thick, isn't he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: At least Hagrid didn't get fired.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yeah but I heard Draco's father's furious. We haven't heard the end of this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He's been sighted! He's been sighted!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sirius Black!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Dufftown? That's not far from here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You don't think he'd come to Hogwarts, do you? With dementors at every entrance?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Dementors? He's already slipped past them once. Who's to say he won't do it again?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's right. Black could be anywhere. It's like trying to catch smoke. Like trying to catch smoke with your bare hands.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Intriguing, isn't it? Would anyone like to venture a guess... as to what is inside?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's a boggart, that is.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Very good, Mr. Thomas. Now, can anybody tell me what a boggart looks like?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No one knows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: When did she get here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Boggarts are shape-shifters. They take the shape of whatever a particular person fears the most. That's what makes them so...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: So terrifying, yes, yes, yes... Luckily, a very simple charm exists to repel a boggart. Let's practice it now. Without wands, please. After me. Riddikulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Riddikulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Very good. A little louder and very clear. Listen: Riddikulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Riddikulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This class is ridiculous.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Very good. So much for the easy part. You see, the incantation alone is not enough. What really finishes a boggart is laughter. You need to force it to assume a shape you find truly amusing. Let me explain. Uh... Neville, would you join me, please? Come on, don't be shy. Come on. Come on. Hello. Neville, what frightens you most of all?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor Snape.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sorry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor Snape.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor Snape. Yes, frightens all. And I believe you live with your grandmother.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Y-Yes but I don't want that boggart to turn into her, either.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No... it won't. I want you to picture her clothes. Only her clothes, very clearly, in your mind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: She carries a red handbag...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We don't need to hear. As long as you see it, we'll see it. Now, when I open that wardrobe... here's what I want you to do. Excuse me. Imagine Professor Snape in your grandmother's clothes. Can you do that? Yes. Wand at the ready. One, two, three. Think, Neville, think.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Riddikulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Wonderful, Neville, wonderful! Incredible! Okay... to the back, Neville. Everyone, form a line! Form a line! I want everyone to picture the thing they fear the very most... and turn it into something funny. Next! Ron! Concentrate. Face your fear. Be brave! Wand at the ready, Ron, wand at the ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Riddikulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes! You see? Very good, very good! Marvelous! Absolutely, very, very enjoyable! Parvati! Next! Show us what you see. Keep your nerve. Steady.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Riddikulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And next! Step up, step up! Wonderful, wonderful! Here! Riddikulus! Right. Sorry about that. That's enough for today. Collect your books from the back. That's the end of the lesson. Thank you! Sorry! Sorry, you can have too much of a good thing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now remember, these visits to Hogsmeade village are a privilege. Should your behavior reflect poorly on the school in anyway that privilege shall not be extended again. No permission form signed, no visiting the village. That's the rule, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Those with permission, follow me. Those without, stay put.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But professor I thought if you signed it, then I could...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I can't. Only a parent or a guardian can sign. Since I am neither, it would be inappropriate. I'm sorry, Potter. That's my final word.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Forget about it, guys. See you later.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor, can I ask you something?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You want to know why I stopped you facing that boggart, yes? I would've thought it'd be obvious. I assumed it would take the shape of Lord Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I did think of Voldemort at first. But then I remembered that night on the train... and the dementor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm very impressed. That suggests what you fear the most is fear itself. This is very wise.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Before I fainted... I heard something. A woman... screaming.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Dementors force us to relive our very worst memories. Our pain becomes their power.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I think it was my mother... the night she was murdered.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The very first time I saw you, Harry, I recognized you immediately. Not by your scar, by your eyes. They're your mother, Lily's. Yes. Oh, yes. I knew her. Your mother was there for me at a time when no one else was. Not only was she a singularly gifted witch... she was also an uncommonly kind woman. She had a way of seeing the beauty in others... even, and perhaps most especially, when that person could not see it in themselves. And your father, James, on the other hand... he... He had a certain, shall we say, talent for trouble. A talent, rumor has it, he passed on to you. You're more like them than you know, Harry. In time, you'll come to see just how much.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Honeyduke's Sweetshop is brilliant, but nothing beats Zonko's Joke Shop. We never did got a chance to go to the Shrieking Shack though. You heard it's the most...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The most haunted building in Britain. Yeah I know. What's going on?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Probably Neville forgotten the password again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hey!.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, you're there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Let me through, please. Excuse me! I'm Head Boy! Get back, all of you. No one is to enter this dormitory until it's been searched.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The Fat Lady! She's gone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Serves her right. She was a terrible singer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's not funny, Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Keep calm, everyone. Break into fours. Back to your common room. Be quiet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Make way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The headmaster's here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on, move.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You heard. Move!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Filch? Round up the ghosts. Tell them to search every painting in the castle to find the Fat Lady.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: There's no need for ghosts, professor. The Fat Lady's there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mind where you're going! Slow down! You listen! I'm Head Boy! Come back here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Keep moving!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Dear lady, who did this to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Eyes like the devil, he's got, and a soul as dark as his name. It's him, headmaster. The one they all talk about. He's here, somewhere in the castle! Sirius Black!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Secure the castle, Mr. Filch. The rest of you, to the Great Hall.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I've searched the Astronomy Tower and the Owlery, sir. But there's nothing there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ah, thank you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The third floor's clear too, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Very good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I've done the dungeons, headmaster. No sign of Black, nor anywhere else in the castle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I didn't really expect him to linger.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Remarkable feat, don't you think? To enter Hogwarts Castle on one's own... completely undetected?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Quite remarkable, yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Any theories on how he managed it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Many. Each as unlikely as the next.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You may recall... prior to the start of term I expressed concerns... about your appointment of Professor...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Not a single professor inside this castle would help Sirius Black enter it. I'm quite convinced the castle is safe... and I'm more than willing to send the students back to their houses.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What about Potter? Should he be warned?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps. But for now, let him sleep. For in dreams, we enter a world that's entirely our own. Let them swim in the deepest ocean or glide over the highest cloud.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Turn to page 394.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, sir. Where's Professor Lupin?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's not really your concern, is it, Potter? Suffice it to say your professor finds himself incapable of teaching... at the present time. Turn to page 394.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Werewolves?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But sir, we just learned about red caps and hinkypunks. We're not meant to start that for weeks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Quiet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: When did she come in? Did you see her come in?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now, which one of you can tell me the difference... between an Animagus and a werewolf? No one? How disappointing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Please, sir. An Animagus is a wizard who elects to turn into an animal. A werewolf has no choice. With each full moon, when he transforms, he no longer remembers who he is. He'd kill his best friend if he crossed his path. Furthermore, the werewolf only responds to the call of its own kind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Thank you, Mr. Malfoy. That's the second time... you've spoken out of turn, Miss Granger. Are you incapable of restraining yourself... or do you take pride in being an insufferable know-it-all?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He's got a point, you know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Five points from Gryffindor. As an antidote to your ignorance, and on my desk, by Monday morning... two rolls of parchment on the werewolf, with emphasis... on recognizing it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sir, it's Quidditch tomorrow.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Then I suggest you take extra care, Mr. Potter. Loss of limb will not excuse you. Page 394. The term werewolf... is a contraction of the Anglo-Saxon word were... which means man, and wolf. Werewolf, man-wolf. There are several ways to become a werewolf. They include being given the power of shape-shifting... being bitten by a werewolf...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Go, Harry! Go, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Arresto momentum!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He looks a bit peaky, doesn't he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Peaky? What do you expect? He fell over 100 feet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, come on Ron, let's walk you off the astronomy tower and see what you look like.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Probably a right sight better than he normally does.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How are you feeling?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, brilliant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You gave us a right good scare there, mate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What happened?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, you fell off your broom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Really? I meant the match. Who won?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Umm... no one blames you, Harry. The dementors aren't supposed to come inside the grounds. Dumbledore's furious. As soon as he saved you, he sent them off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: There's something else you should know too. When you fell, your broom sort of blew into the Whomping Willow, and... Well...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry to hear about your broomstick. Is there no chance of fixing it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. Professor, why do the dementors affect me so? I mean, more than everyone else?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Listen. Dementors are amongst the foulest creatures to walk this earth. They feed on every good feeling, every happy memory... until a person is left with absolutely nothing but his worst experiences. You are not weak, Harry. The dementors affect you most because there are true horrors in your past. Horrors your classmates can scarcely imagine. You have nothing to be ashamed of.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm scared, professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well I'd consider you a fool if you weren't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I need to know how to fight them. You could teach me. You made that dementor on the train go away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: There was only one that night.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But you made it go away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I don't pretend to be an expert, Harry. But as the dementors seem to have developed a particular interest in you... perhaps I should teach you. But after the holidays. For now, I need to rest.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Last call for Hogsmeade! Come on, now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Guys, let me go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Clever, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But not clever enough. Besides, we've got a better way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm trying to get to Hogsmeade.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We know. Don't worry. We'll get you there. We'll show you a quicker way. If you pipe down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We know. Don't worry. We'll get you there. We'll show you a quicker way. If you pipe down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Bless him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Let me go! Come on, guys. Don't...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come and join the big boys.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come and join the big boys.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What are you doing?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What's this rubbish?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What's this rubbish? he says. That there it's the secret to our success.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's a wrench giving it to you believe me. But we've decided your needs are greater than ours.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: George, if you will.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mr's. Moony, Wormtail, Padfoot and Prongs... are proud to present the Marauder's Map.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We owe them so much.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hang on. This is Hogwarts. And that... No. Is that really...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: In his study.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Pacing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Does that a lot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: So you mean this map shows...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Everyone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Everyone?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Everyone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Where they are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What they're doing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Every minute.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Of every day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Brilliant! Where did you get it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Knicked it from Filch's office, of course. First year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now listen, there are seven secret passageways... out of the castle. We'd recommend

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The One-Eyed Witch passageway.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It'll lead you straight to Honeyduke's seller.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You best hurry. Filch is heading this way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh and Harry don't forget. When you're done, just give it a tap and say:

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mischief managed. Otherwise, anyone can read it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mischief managed. Otherwise, anyone can read it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now, how much do you want? Delicious.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's meant to be the most haunted building in Britain. Did I mention that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Twice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Do you want to move a bit closer?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: To the Shrieking Shack?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Actually, I'm fine here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, well. Look who's here. You two shopping for your new dream home? Bit grand for you, isn't it, Weasle-Bee? Don't your family sleep in uh... one room?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Shut your mouth, Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Uh, Not very friendly. Boys, I think it's time we teach Weasle-Bee how to respect his superiors.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hope you don't mean yourself!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How dare you talk to me! You filthy little mudblood! Who is that? Don't stand there! Do something!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What's up, Malfoy? Lost your skis?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Get out of the way! Move!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Malfoy! Wait! Wait!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell, Harry. That was not funny.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Those weasels! Never told me about any Marauder's Map.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But Harry isn't going to keep it. He's going to turn it over to Professor McGonagall. Aren't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sure. Along with his Invisibility Cloak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, Look who it is. Madam Rosmerta. Ron fancies her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's not true!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor McGonagall!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Cornelius!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Allow me, minister.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, Hagrid...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sorry about that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Rosmerta, my dear. I hope business is good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It'd be a lot better if the Ministry wasn't sending dementors... into my pub every other night!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We have... We have a killer on the loose!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sirius Black in Hogsmeade! And what would bring him here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No underage wizards allowed in today! Shut the damn door!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: So rude.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Thick heads.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Thick heads?! How dare they! Who are they calling thick heads? Young whippersnappers!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Nobody's going to come to a pub where they're gonna get scared out of their wits. Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore does not want dementors around the place, I can assure you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now, tell me what this is all about.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well. Now years ago, when Harry Potter's parents realized they were marked for death... You remember? They went into hiding. Few knew where they were. One who did was Sirius Black. And he told You-Know-Who!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Not only did Black lead You-Know-Who to the Potters that night, but he also killed one of their friends, Peter Pettigrew!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Peter Pettigrew?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes, little lump of a boy. Always trailing after Sirius Black.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ah, I remember him. Never let James and Sirius out of his sight. But what happened?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well Peter Pettigrew tried to warn the Potters... and might have managed to, had he not run into an old friend, Sirius Black.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Black was vicious. He didn't kill Pettigrew. He destroyed him! A finger. That's all that was left. A finger. Nothing else.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes. Sirius Black may not have put his hands to the Potters, but he's the reason they're dead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And now he wants to finish what he started.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mhmm.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I don't believe it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ah, that's not the worst of it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What could be worse?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This: Sirius Black was... and remains to this day... Harry Potter's godfather!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ron, look! Sorry, sorry. Excuse me, excuse me, sorry. Harry, what happened?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He was their friend... and he betrayed them. He was their friend! I hope he finds me. Because when he does, I'm gonna be ready! When he does, I'm gonna kill him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry. There you are. You came. Are you sure about this, Harry? You know this is very advanced magic well beyond the Ordinary Wizarding Level.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm sure.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, everything's prepared. Now, the spell I'm going to try to teach you is called the Patronus Charm. Did you ever hear of it? No? Well... A Patronus is a kind of positive force. For the wizard who conjures one... it works something like a shield, with the dementor feeding on it rather than him. But in order for it to work, you need to think of a memory. Not just any memory, a very happy memory, a very powerful memory.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Can you do this? Yes. Very well. Close your eyes. Concentrate. Explore your past. Do you have a memory? Allow it to fill you up. Lose yourself within it. Then speak the incantation, Expecto Patronum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Expecto Patronum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Very good. Shall we? Wand at the ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Expecto Patronum! Expecto... Expecto... Expect...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Here we go. Come on. Sit up. Deep breaths. It's all right. I didn't expect you to do it the first time. That would have been remarkable. Here, eat this. You'll feel better.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's one nasty dementor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, no, no, no. That was a boggart, Harry. A boggart. The real thing would be worse. Much, much worse. As a matter of interest, what were you thinking? Which memory did you choose?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The first time I rode a broom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's not good enough. Not nearly good enough.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: There's another. It's not... happy, exactly. Well, it is. It's the happiest I've ever felt... but it's complicated.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Is it strong? Then let's give it a try. You feel ready?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Just do it. Expecto Patronum! Expecto Patronum!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes! Well done, Harry. Well done!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I think I've had enough for today.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes. Sit down. Here. Eat this, it helps. It really helps. And just so you know, Harry... I think you'd have given your father a run for his money. And that... is saying something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I was thinking of him. And Mom. Seeing their faces. They were talking to me. Just talking. That's the memory I chose. I don't even know if it's real. But it's the best I have.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Beautiful day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Gorgeous.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Unless of course you've been ripped to pieces!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ripped to pieces? What are you talking about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ronald has lost his rat.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I haven't lost anything! Your cat killed him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Rubbish.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you've seen the way that bloodthirsty beast of hers... is always lurking about. And Scabbers is gone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, maybe you should take better care of your pets!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Your cat killed him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Did not.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Did.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Didn't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How did it go, Hagrid? The hearing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, first off, the committee members took turns... talking about why we were there. And then I got up and did my piece. Said how Buckbeak... was a good hippogriff, always cleaned his feathers. And then Lucius Malfoy got up. Well, you can imagine. He said Buckbeak was a deadly and dangerous creature... who would kill you as soon as look at you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And then he asked for the worst, did old Lucius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: They're not sacking you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No, I'm not sacked. Buckbeak's been sentenced to death!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Spiders! There's... There's spiders. Spiders. They want me to tap-dance. I don't wanna tap-dance!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You tell those spiders Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Right, yeah. Tell them. I'll tell them...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Peter Pettigrew?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Little lump of a boy. Always trailing after Sirius Black.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Black was vicious. He didn't kill Pettigrew, he destroyed him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Put that light out!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Watch it there, boy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We're trying to sleep here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes, we are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mischief managed. Nox.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Potter. What are you doing wandering the corridors at night?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I was sleepwalking.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How extraordinarily like your father you are, Potter. He, too, was exceedingly arrogant, strutting about the castle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: My dad didn't strut. And nor do I. Now, if you don't mind, I would appreciate it if you could lower your wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Turn out your pockets. Turn out your pockets! What's this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Spare bit of parchment.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Really? Open it. Reveal your secrets. Read it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Mr's. Moony, Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs... offer their compliments to Professor Snape and...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And request that he keep his abnormally large nose out of other people's business.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Why, you insolent little...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, well. Lupin. Out for a little walk... in the moonlight, are we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, are you alright?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That remains to be seen. I have just now confiscated a rather curious artifact from Mr. Potter. Take a look, Lupin. Supposed to be your area of expertise. Clearly, it's full of dark magic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I seriously doubt it, Severus. It looks as though it's merely a parchment designed to insult anyone... who tries to read it. I suspect it's a Zonko product. Nevertheless, I shall investigate any hidden qualities it may possess. It is, after all, as you say, my area of expertise. Harry, would you come with me, please? Professor, good night.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Are you deaf? Put that light out!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come in. I haven't the faintest idea how this map came to be in your possession... but quite frankly, I am astounded that you didn't hand it in. Did it never occur to you that this, in the hands of Sirius Black... is a map to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. No, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Your father never set much store by the rules either. But he and your mother gave their lives to save yours. Gambling their sacrifice by wandering around the castle unprotected... with a killer on the loose seems to me a poor way to repay them! Now, I will not cover up for you again, Harry. Do you hear me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I want you to return to your dormitory and stay there. And don't take any detours. If you do, I shall know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor, just so you know, I don't think that map always works. Earlier, it showed someone in the castle. Someone I know to be dead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, really? And who might that be?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Peter Pettigrew.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's not possible.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's just what I saw. Good night, professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Broaden your minds. You must look beyond. The art of crystal gazing is in the clearing of the Inner Eye. Only then can you see. Try again. Now, what do we have here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, do you mind me trying? The Grim, possibly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: My dear, from the first moment you stepped foot in my class... I sensed that you did not possess the proper spirit... for the noble art of Divination. No, you see, there. You may be young in years, but the heart that beats beneath your bosom is as shriveled as an old maid's, your soul as dry as the pages of the books... to which you so desperately cleave. Have I said something?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: She's gone mental, Hermione has. I mean, not that she wasn't always mental... but now it's in the open for everyone to see.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hang on. We better take this back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm not going back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Fine. See you later.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: See you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor Trelawney...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He will return tonight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sorry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Tonight, he who betrayed his friends, whose heart rots with murder... shall break free. Innocent blood shall be spilt... and servant and master shall be reunited once more. I'm so sorry, dear boy. Did you say something?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. Nothing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I can't believe they're going to kill Buckbeak. It's just too horrible.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It just got worse.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now I'll tell you. Father said... I can keep the hippogriff's head. I think I'll donate it to the Gryffindors' room. This is going to be rich. Look who's here. Come to see the show?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You! You foul, loathsome, evil little cockroach!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, no! He's not worth it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Malfoy, are you okay? Let's go. Quick.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Not a word to anyone, understood?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That felt good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Not good, brilliant!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Look at him. Loves the smell of the trees when the wind blows through them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Why don't we just set him free?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: They'd know it was me, and then Dumbledore... would get into trouble. He's coming down, you know? Dumbledore. Says he wants to be with me when they... When it happens. Great man, Dumbledore. A great man.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We'll stay with you too, Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You'll do no such thing! Think I want you seeing something like that? No. You just drink your tea and be off. Oh. Before you do, Ron...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Scabbers! You're alive!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Keep a closer eye on your pets, Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I think that means you owe someone an apology.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Right. Next time I see Crookshanks, I'll let him know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I meant me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Blimey! What was that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ow! Hagrid!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, crikey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Very interesting.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No, minister. Over this way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's late. It's nearly dark. You shouldn't be here. Someone sees you outside the castle at this time of night, you'll be in trouble. Big trouble. Particularly you, Harry. With you in a moment! Quick. Quick!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid. It'll be fine. It'll be okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Go on, go on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes, that's the... lings you see over there...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: On the slope.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: On the slope... Ah, Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Good evening.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Minister. Just make your way through. Have a tea, if you like.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No, Hagrid, thank you. Now gentlemen...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'd like to have a cup of tea.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, I think we should get down to our business, shall we? Very well. It is the decision of the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures that the hippogriff known as Buckbeak, hereinafter called the condemned, shall be executed this day at sundown.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Dear, dear...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Now, now, Hagrid. Now, come on. All right. It'll be all right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The execution shall dispatch...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I thought I just saw... Never mind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Let's go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Buckbeak didn't mean no harm.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, no.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He bit me! Scabbers!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ron. Ron! Ron!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Scabbers, come back!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Wait!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Scabbers, you bit me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you do realize what tree this is?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's not good. Ron, run!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, Hermione, run! It's the Grim! Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ron! Ron, wait! Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Help!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ron! Ron! Ron! Ron! Come on! Move!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Duck!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I'm sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Where do you suppose this goes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I have a hunch. I just hope I'm wrong.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We're in the Shrieking Shack, aren't we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on. Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ron. You're okay. The dog. Where is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry it's a trap. He's the dog. He's an Animagus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: If you want to kill Harry, you'll have to kill us too!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. Only one will die tonight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Then it'll be you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Are you going to kill me, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus! Well, well, Sirius. Looking rather ragged, aren't we? Finally, the flesh reflects the madness within.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, you'd know all about the madness within, wouldn't you Remus? I found him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I understand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Let's kill him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No! I trusted you! And all this time, you've been his friend. He's a werewolf! That's why he's been missing classes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How long have you known?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Since Professor Snape set the essay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, well, well, Hermione. You really are the brightest witch of your age, I've ever met.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Enough talk, Remus! Come on, let's kill him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Wait!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I did my waiting! Twelve years of it! In Azkaban!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Very well. Kill him. But wait one more minute. Harry has the right to know why.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I know why. You betrayed my parents. You're the reason they're dead!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No, Harry it wasn't him. Somebody did betray your parents... but it was somebody who, until quite recently, I believed to be dead!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Who was it, then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Peter Pettigrew! And he's in this room! Right now! Come out, come out, Peter! Come out, come out and play!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus! Vengeance is sweet. How I hoped I'd be the one to catch you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Severus...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I told Dumbledore you were helping an old friend into the castle, and now here's the proof.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Brilliant, Snape. Once again you've put your keen penetrating mind to the task and as usual come to the wrong conclusion. Now, if you'll excuse us, Remus and I have some unfinished business... to attend to.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Give me a reason. I beg you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Severus don't be a fool.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He can't help it. It's habit.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sirius be quiet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Be quiet yourself Remus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh listen to you two, quarreling like an old married couple.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Why don't you run along and play with your chemistry set!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I could do it, you know. But why deny the dementors? They're so longing to see you. Do I detect a flicker of fear? Oh, yes. A Dementor's Kiss. One can only imagine what that must be like. It's said to be nearly unbearable to witness, but I'll do my best.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Severus, please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: After you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry! What did you just do?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You attacked a teacher!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Tell me about Peter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He was at school with us. We thought he was our friend!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. Pettigrew's dead. You killed him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No, he didn't. I thought so too, until you mentioned seeing Pettigrew on the map!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The map was lying, then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The map never lies! Pettigrew's alive! And he's right there!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Me?! He's mental!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Not you! Your rat!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Scabbers has been in my family for...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Twelve years? Curiously long life for a common garden rat! He's missing a toe, isn't he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: So what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: All they could find of Pettigrew was his...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Finger! That dirty coward cut it off so everyone would think he was dead! And then he transformed into a rat!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Show me. Give it to him, Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What are you trying to do to him? Scabbers! Leave him alone! Get off him! What are you doing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Remus? Sirius. My old friends! Harry! Look at you! You look so much like your father! Like James! We were the best of friends...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How dare you speak to Harry! How dare you talk about James in front of him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You sold James and Lily to Voldemort, didn't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I didn't mean to! The Dark Lord. You have no idea the weapons he possesses! Ask yourself, Sirius! What would you have done? What would you have done?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I would have died! I would have died, rather than betray my friends!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, James wouldn't have wanted me killed! Your dad... Your dad would have spared me! He would show me mercy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You should've realized, Peter, that if Voldemort didn't kill you, then we would! Together!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, this man...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I know what he is. But we'll take him to the castle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Bless you, boy! Bless you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Get off! I said we'd take you to the castle. After that, the dementors can have you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sorry about the bite. I reckon that twinges a bit.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: A bit? A bit? You almost tore my leg off!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I was going for the rat. Normally, I have a very sweet disposition as a dog. In fact, more than once, James suggested that I make the change permanent. The tail I could live with. But the fleas, they're murder.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You better go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. Don't worry, okay? It's fine. I'll stay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You go, I'll stay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You okay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm fine. Go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That looks really painful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: So painful. They might chop it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'm sure Madam Pomfrey will fix it in a heartbeat.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's too late. It's ruined. It'll have to be chopped off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
