Harry Potter.text: It's beautiful, isn't it? I'll never forget the first time I walked through those doors. It'll be nice to do it again as a free man. That was a noble thing you did back there. He doesn't deserve it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well I just didn't think my dad would have wanted his two best friends... to become killers. Besides, dead, the truth dies with him. Alive, you're free.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Turn me into a maggot! Turn me into a flobberworm! Anything but the dementors! Ron! Haven't I been a good friend? A good pet? You won't let them give me to the dementors, will you? I was your rat! Sweet girl! Clever girl! Surely you won't let them...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Get away from her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I don't know if you know, Harry... but when you were born, James and Lily made me your godfather.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I can understand if you choose to stay with your aunt and uncle... but if you ever wanted a different home...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What? Come and live with you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's just a thought. I can understand if you don't want to.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Remus, my old friend! Have you taken your potion tonight? You know the man you truly are, Remus! This heart is where you truly live! This heart here! This flesh is only flesh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Remus! Remus! Run! Run!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Wait! Wait!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hermione! Bad idea. Bad idea.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor? Professor Lupin?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Nice doggy. Nice doggy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: There you are, Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sirius!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come back here, Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sirius! No. Sirius! Expecto Patronum!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I saw my dad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He sent the dementors away. I saw him across the lake.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Listen Harry, they've captured Sirius. Any minute the dementors are going to perform the Kiss.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You mean they're gonna kill him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. It's worse. Much worse. They're going to suck out his soul. Headmaster, you've got to stop them. They've got the wrong man.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's true. Sirius is innocent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's Scabbers who did it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Scabbers?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He's my rat, sir. He's not really a rat. He was a rat. He was my brother Percy's rat. But then they gave him an owl...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: The point is, we know the truth. Please believe us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I do, Miss Granger. But the word of three 13-year-old wizards will convince few others. A child's voice, however honest and true... is meaningless to those who have forgotten how to listen. Mysterious thing, time. Powerful... and when meddled with, dangerous. Sirius Black is in the topmost cell of the Dark Tower. You know the laws, Miss Granger. You must not be seen. And you would do well, I feel, to return before this last chime. If not, the consequences are too ghastly to discuss. If you succeed tonight... more than one innocent life may be spared. Three turns should do it, I think. Oh, and by the way. When in doubt, I find retracing my steps to be a wise place to begin. Good luck.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What the bloody hell was that all about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, Ron, but seeing as you can't walk...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What just happened? Where's Ron?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: 7:30. Where were we at 7:30?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I don't know. Going to Hagrid's?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on. And we can't be seen.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hermione! Hermione! Hermione, wait. Hermione, will you please tell me what it is we're doing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You foul, loathsome, evil little cockroach!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, no! He's not worth it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This is not normal.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This is a Time-Turner, Harry. McGonagall gave it to me first term. This is how I've been getting to my lessons all year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You mean we've gone back in time?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes. Dumbledore obviously wanted us to return to this moment. Clearly, something happened he wants us to change.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Good punch.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Thanks. Malfoy's coming.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Run.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Not a word to anyone, understood? I'm gonna get that jumped-up mudblood! Mark my words.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That felt good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Not good, brilliant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on. We should be at Hagrid's.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Look. Buckbeak's still alive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Of course. Remember what Dumbledore said? If we succeed, more than one innocent life could be spared. Let's go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Here they come. I'd better hurry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Fudge has to see Buckbeak before we steal him. Otherwise, he'll think Hagrid set him free.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Scabbers, you're alive!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Keep a closer eye on your pet, Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's Pettigrew.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you can't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He betrayed my parents. You don't expect me to sit here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes, and you must! Harry, you're in Hagrid's hut now. If you just go bursting in, you'll think you've gone mad. Awful things happen to wizards who meddle with time. We can't be seen.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Fudge is coming. And we aren't leaving? Why aren't we leaving?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Are you mad?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ow!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Ow! That hurt!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Sorry. We're coming out the back door. Go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Is that really what my hair looks like from the back?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I thought I just saw... Never mind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Let's go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Okay, go, Harry. Go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Get away. Get off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Minister, I really think I should sign as well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yes, very well. Perhaps it would be...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Okay, Buckbeak. Come quickly. Come with us now. Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Keep trying. Come on. Quickly. Buckbeak. Okay? Quickly. Hurry up. Okay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Your name only.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's such a very long name...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hurry up now, Buckbeak, okay? Come on. Come on, Buckbeak. Come and get the nice dead ferret. Come on. It's here. Come on, Beaky.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Here we are, minister. Follow me. Now, look there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Where?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Look beyond the rocks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What am I supposed to see?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dippet had that ling planted when he was headmaster.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Oh, yes. Indeed, indeed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And all the strawberries, you see?.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on, Buckbeak. Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I see no strawberries.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Over there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Where?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Over there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Let's get this over, please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: All right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But where is it? I saw the beast, just now. Not a moment ago!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How extraordinary.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Buckbeak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come now, Dumbledore. Someone's obviously released him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Buckbeak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I don't think the minister's suggesting you had anything to do with this. How could you? You've been with us all the time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Right. Well, well. We must search the grounds.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, search the skies, if you must, minister. Meanwhile, I'd like a nice cup of tea or a large brandy. Oh, executioner, your services are no longer required. Thank you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You'll find no small glasses in this house, professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Come on. This way. This way, now. Now what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We save Sirius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No idea. Look. It's Lupin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Immobulus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And Snape's coming.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And now we wait.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And now we wait.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: At least someone's enjoying himself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yeah. Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yeah?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Before, down by the lake, when I was with Sirius... I did see someone. That someone made the dementors go away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: With a Patronus. I heard Snape telling Dumbledore. According to him... only a really powerful wizard could have conjured it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It was my dad. My dad conjured the Patronus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, but your dad's... Dead. I know. I'm just telling you what I saw.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Here we come.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You see Sirius talking to me there? He's asking me to come live with him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That's great.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: When we free him, I'll never have to go back to the Dursleys'. It'll just be me and him. We could live in the country... someplace you can see the sky. I think he'll like that after all those years in Azkaban.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Run!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Let's go! What are you doing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Saving your life!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Thanks. Great! Now he's coming for us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, I didn't think about that. Run!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: That was so scary.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Poor Professor Lupin's having a really tough night. Sirius! Come on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This is horrible.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry. My dad will come. He'll conjure the Patronus. Any minute now! Right there! You'll see!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry, listen to me. No one's coming.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry, he will! He will come! Sirius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You're dying... both of you. Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Expecto Patronum!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You were right, Hermione. It wasn't my dad I saw earlier. It was me! I saw myself conjuring the Patronus before. I knew I could do it this time because... well, I had already done it. Does that make sense?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But I don't like flying...!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Bombarda!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I'll be forever grateful for this... to both of you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I want to go with you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: One day, perhaps. For some time, my life will be too unpredictable. And besides... you're meant to be here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But you're innocent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: And you know it. And for now, that will do. I expect you're tired of hearing this... but you look so like your father. Except your eyes. You have...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: My mother's eyes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's cruel that I spent so much time with James and Lily, and you so little. But know this: The ones that love us never really leave us. And you can always find them... in here. You really are the brightest witch of your age.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: We have to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: He's free. We did it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Did what? Good night.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How did you get there? I was talking to you there. And now you're there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What's he talking about, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: I don't know. Honestly, Ron. How can somebody be in two places at once?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Harry. I saw you coming. I've looked worse, believe me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: You've been sacked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No. No. I resigned, actually.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Resigned? Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Well, it seems that somebody let slip the nature of my condition. This time tomorrow, the owls will start arriving and parents will not want... well, someone like me teaching their children.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: But Dumbledore...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore has already... risked enough on my behalf. Besides, people like me are... Well, let's just say that I'm used to it by now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Why do you look so miserable, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: None of it made any difference. Pettigrew escaped.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Didn't make any difference? Harry it made all the difference in the world. You have uncovered the truth. You saved an innocent man from a terrible fate. It made a great deal of difference. If I am proud of anything... it is of how much you have learned this year. Now, since I am no longer your teacher... I feel no guilt whatsoever about giving this back to you. So now I'll say goodbye, Harry. I feel sure we'll meet again sometime. Until then... mischief managed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Stand back, I said! Or I'll take it upstairs if you don't settle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Harry. Wherever did you get it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Can I have a go, Harry? After you, of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: What are you talking about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Quiet. Let the man through. I didn't mean to open it, Harry. It was badly wrapped. They made me do it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Did not.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Did not.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: It's a Firebolt. It's the fastest broom in the world.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: For me? But who sent it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: No one knows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: This came with it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Go on, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, let's see.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter.text: How fast is it, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bloody kids.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh no no no my Lord Voldemort. I only meant... perhaps if we were to do it without the boy..

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: NO! The boy is everything, it cannot be done without him and it WILL be done exactly as I say.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I will not disappoint you my lord.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Good. First, gather our old comrades. Send them a sign.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Nagini tells me the old caretaker is standing outside the door.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Step aside so I can give our guest a proper greeting.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Are you alright?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hermione. Bad dream. When did you get here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Just now. You?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Last night.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Wake up. Wake up Ronald!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Honestly. Get dressed, and don't go back to sleep. Come on Ron! Your mother says breakfast's ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Where are we actually going?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Don't know. Hey Dad! Where are we going?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Haven't the foggiest, keep up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Arthur! It's about time son.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Sorry Amos. Some of us had a bit of a sleepy start. This is Amos Diggory everyone, he works with me at the ministry. And this strapping young lad must be Cedric, am I right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Merlin's beard, you must be Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes sir. This way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Great great pleasure.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Pleasure to meet you too sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: That's it sir, just over there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Shall we? We don't want to be late.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Why are they all standing around that manky old boot?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: That isn't just any old manky boot mate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's a portkey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Time to go. Ready?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What's a 'portkey'?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: After 3. One... Two...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Three!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Let go kids!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What??

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Let! Go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I bet that cleared your sinuses eh?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well kids, welcome to the Quidditch World Cup!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Parting of the waves I think old chap, see you at the match.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: See ya later Cedric.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Home sweet home.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Girls. Choose a bunk and unpack. Ron, get out of the kitchen we're all hungry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yeah get out of the kitchen Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yeah get out of the kitchen Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Feet off the table.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Feet off the table.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Feet off the table.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I love magic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Blimey Dad, how far up are we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well put it this way, if it rains... you'll be the first to know

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Father and I are in the minister's box, by personal invitation of Cornelius Fudge himself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Don't boast Draco. There's no need with these people. Do enjoy yourself won't you. While you can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Come on up, take your seats. I told you these seats would be worth waiting for.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Come on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's the Irish!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Here come the Bulgarians!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Krum!!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Krum!!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Krum!!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Good evening! It gives me great pleasure to welcome each and every one of you to the final of the 422nd Quidditch World Cup. Let the match begin!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: There's no one like Krum. He's like a bird the way he rides the wind. He's more than an athlete, he's an artist.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Think you're in love Ron?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Viktor I love you! Viktor I do!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Viktor I love you! Viktor I do!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: When we're apart my heart beats only for youuu!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: When we're apart my heart beats only for youuu!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: When we're apart my heart beats only for youuu!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Sounds like the irish have got their pride on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Stop! Stop it. It's not the irish. We've gotta get out of here. Now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Get back to the portkey everybody, and stick together. Fred, George... Ginny is your responsibility.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Been looking for you for ages. Thought we lost you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What is that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Stop! That's my son.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ron, Harry, Hermione are you alright?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Which of you conjured this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You can't possibly..

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Do not lie! You have been discovered at the scene of the crime!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Crime?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Barty, they're just kids.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What crime?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry it's his mark.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Those people tonight, in the masks... they're his too aren't they? they're his followers.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Follow me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: There was a man. Before. There.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: All of you, this way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry, who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I dunno. I didn't see his face.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Anything from the trolley? Anything from the trolley?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Anything from the trolley dears?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Packet of drewbals and a liquorice wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: On second thought, just the drewbals.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's alright I'll get it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Just the drewbals, thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Two pumpkin pasties please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Thank you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Anything sweet for you dear?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh no thank you I'm not hungry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: This is horrible, how can the ministry not know who conjured it. Isn't there any security or?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Loads according to Dad, that's what worried them so much. Happened right under their noses.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's hurting again isn't it, your scar.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I'm fine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You know Sirius will want to hear about this. What you saw at the world cup, and the dream.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Clear the runway.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well there's something you don't see every day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Now we're all settled in and sorted, I'd like to make an announcement. This castle will not only be your home this year but home to some very special guests as well. You see Hogwarts has been choosen...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: So Hogwarts has been choosen to host a legendary event. The Tri-Wizard tournament. Now for those of you who do not know, the tri-wizard tournament brings together three schools for a series of magical contests. From each school a single contestant is selected to compete. Now let me be clear, if choosen you stand alone. And trust me when I say these contests are not for the faint hearted, but more of that later. For now please join me in welcoming the lovely ladies of the Beauxbatons Academy of magic and their headmistress Madam Maxime.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Blimey, that's one big woman.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: And now our friends from the north, please greet the proud sons of Durmstrang and the high master Igor Karkaroff.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Blimey it's him, Viktor Krum!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Albus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Igor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore, my horses have travelled a long way. They will need attending to.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Not to worry Madame Maxime, our gamekeeper Hagrid's more than capable of seeing to them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: But you know Monsieur Hagrid, they drink only single malt whiskey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You idiot!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Your attention please! I would like to say a few words. Eternal glory, that is what awaits the student who wins the tri-wizard tournament. But to do this that student must survive three tasks. Three extremely dangerous tasks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Wicked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: For this reason the ministry has seen fit to impose a new rule. To explain all this we have the head of the department of international magic cooperation Mister Bartimus Crouch.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell, it's Mad-Eye Moody.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Alastor Moody? The aura.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: He was a catcher. Half the cells in Azkaban are full thanks to him. He's supposed to be mad as a hatter though these days.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: My dear old friend, thanks for coming.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: That stupid roof.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What's that he's drinking do you suppose?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I don't know but I don't think it's Pumpkin Juice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: After much deliberation the ministry has concluded that for their own safety no student under the age of seventeen shall be allowed to put forth their name for the tri-wizard tournament. This decision is final.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: That's rubbish! You don't know what you're doing!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Silence!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The goblet of fire. Anyone wishing to submit themselves for the tournament merely write their name upon a piece of parchment and throw it in the flame before this hour on Thursday night. Do not do so lightly, if choosen there's no turning back. As from this moment the tri-wizard tournament has begun.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Alastor Moody.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ministry malcontent. And your new defence against the dark arts teacher. I'm here because Dumbledore asked me, end of story, goodbye, the end. Any questions? When it comes to the dark arts, I believe in a practical approach. But first, which of you can tell me how many unforgivable curses there are?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Three sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: And they are so named?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Because they are unforgivable. Use of any one of them will...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Will earn you a one way ticket to Azkaban. Correct. Now the ministry says you're too young to see what these curses do. I say different! You need to know what you're up against, you need to be prepared, you need to find somewhere else to put your chewing gum other than the underside of your desk Mr Finnigan!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Aw no way, the old codger can see out the back of his head.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: So, which curse shall we see first?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Give us a curse.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well, my dad did tell me about one... The imperious curse.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ahhh yes, your father would know all about that. Gave the ministry quite a bit of grief a few years ago. Perhaps this will show you why.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hello. What a little beauty.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry. Completely harmless.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: But if she bites... she's lethal!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What are you laughing at?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

Harry Potter.text: Look at this! I can't believe it she's done it again. Miss Granger a plain but ambitious girl seems to be developing a taste for famous wizards. Her latest prey sources report is none other than the Bulgarian bon-bon Viktor Krum. No word yet on how Harry Potter's taking this latest emotional blow.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Parcel for you Mr Weasley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Thank you Nigel.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Not now Nigel. Later. Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I told him I'd get him Harry's autograph. Oh look mum's sent me something. Mum sent me a dress??

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well it does match your eyes. Is there a bonnet?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ginny these must be for you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I'm not wearing that it's ghastly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What are you on about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: They're not for Ginny they're for you! Dress robes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Dress robes? for what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The yule ball has been a tradition of the tri-wizard tournament since its inception. On Christmas eve night we and our guests gather in the great hall for well mannered frivolity. As representitives of the host school I expect each and every one of you to put your best foot forward, and I mean this literally because the yule ball is first and foremost... a dance.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Silence. The house of Godrick Griffindore has commanded the respect of the wizard world for nearly ten centuries. I will not have you in the course of a single evening besmirching that name by behaving like a babbling, bumbling band of baboons.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Try saying that five times faster.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Now to dance is to let the body breathe, inside every girl a secret swan slumbers longing to burst forth and take flight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Something's about to burst out of Hilary but I don't think it's a swan.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Inside every boy a lordly lion prepared to prance. Mr Weasly, will you join me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Now, place your right hand on my waist.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Where?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: My waist.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Now bend your arm. Mr Filch...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: One two three, one two three, one two three.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oi! Never gonna let him forget this are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Never.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Never.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Everybody come together.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Boys, on your feet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Why do they always have to travel in packs? How are you supposed to get one alone to ask them...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Blimey Harry, you slayed dragons. If you can't get a date who can?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I think I'd take the dragon right now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I take after my mum. Though I didn't know her very well, she left when I was about three. No, not the maternal sort her, broke my dad's heart though. You know he was a tiny little fellow my dad, I could pick him up with one hand by the age of six and put him up in the dresser.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: And then he died when I was still in school. So I had to make me own way as it were. But enough of me, what about you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: This is mad. At this rate we'll be the only ones in our year without dates.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well, us and Neville!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: But then again he can take himself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It might interest you to know that Neville's already got someone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Now I'm really depressed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well Hermione, you're a girl.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh well spotted.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Come on. It's one thing for a bloke to show up alone. For a girl it's just sad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I won't be going alone because believe it or not someone's asked me. And I said yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Look. We've just got to grit our teeth and do it. Tonight when we get back to the common room, we'll both have partners. Agreed?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Agreed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Cho!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Watch yourself on the stairs, it's a bit icey at the top.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ok thanks. Cho?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Um.  I just wondered if maybe you wanted to go to the ball with me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Sorry? I didn't catch that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Um. I was just wondering if maybe you wanted to go to the ball with me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Um. Harry I'm sorry but someone's already asked me. And well I've said I'll go with him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ok. Great. Fine. No problem. Good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry I really am sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What happened to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: He just asked Fleur Delacour out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What did she say?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: She said yes??

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Don't be silly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: There she was walking by. You know I like it when they walk. I couldn't help it, it just sort of slipped out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Actually he sort of screamed at her, it was a bit frightening.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What did you do then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What else? I ran for it. I'm not cut out for this Harry. I don't know what got into me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hi Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hi Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hey!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What are those??

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: My dress robes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well they're alright. No lace, no dodgy little collar.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well I expect yours are more traditional.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Traditional?? They're ancient! I look like my great aunt Tessie.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I smell like my great aunt Tessie. Murder me Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Leave it alone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Poor kid, bet she's alone in her room crying her eyes out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hermione of course. Come on Harry, why'd you think she wouldn't tell us who she's coming with?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Because we'd take the mickey out of her if she did.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Because nobody asked her. I would have taken her myself if she weren't so bleeding proud.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hello boys. Don't you look...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: ... dashing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Here you are Potter. Are you and Miss Patil ready?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ready professor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: To dance. It's traditional that the three champions or in this case four are the first to dance. Surely I told you that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh well now you know. Oh, as for your Mr Weasly you may proceed into the great hall with Miss Patil.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: She looks beautiful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yeah she does.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Is that Hermione Granger? With Viktor Krum??

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No. Absolutely not.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry. Take my waist.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hot isn't it? Viktor's gone to get drinks. Care to join us?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No, we'd NOT care to join you and Viktor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What's got your wand in a knot?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: He's a Durmstrang. You're fraternising with the enemy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The enemy?? Who was it wanting his autograph? Besides, the whole point of the tournament is international magical cooperation, to make friends.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hrmph, I think he's got a bit more than friendship on his mind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Are you going to ask me to dance or not?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: He's using you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: How dare you! Besides I can take care of myself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Doubt it. He's way too old.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What? What? That's what you think?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yeah that is what I think.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You know the solution then don't you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Next time there's a ball pluck up the courage and ask me before somebody else does, and not as a last resort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well that's completely off the point. Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Where have you been? Nevermind! Off to bed both of you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: They get scary when they get older.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ron you spoil everything!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Let me see it again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ah yes, the time is close now. Harry! At last! Step aside Wormtail so I can give our guest a proper greeting!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You alright Harry? I just got in. Me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry you told me you'd figured the egg out weeks ago. The task is two days from now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Really? I had no idea. I suppose Viktor's already figured it out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I wouldn't know, we didn't actually talk about the tournament. Actually we didn't really talk at all, Viktor's more of a physical being. I just mean he's not particularly... Mostly he watches me study. It's a bit annoying actually. You are trying to figure this egg out aren't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What's that supposed to mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I mean these tasks are supposed to test you, in the most brutal way they're almost cruel. And um, I'm scared for you. You got by the dragon mostly on nerve, I'm not sure it's going to be enough this time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hey Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Cedric.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: How are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Spectacular.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Look I realise I never really thanked you properly for tipping me off about those dragons.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Forget about it. I'm sure you would have done the same for me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Exactly. You know the prefects bathroom on the fifth floor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's not a bad place for a bath. Just take your egg and mull things over in the hot water.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I must be out of my mind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I'd try putting it in the water if I were you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Myrtle!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Long time no see.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I was circling a blocked drain the other day and could swear I saw a bit of polyjuice potion. Not being a bad boy again are you Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Polyjuice potion! Kicked the habit. Myrtle, did you say try putting it in the water?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well. That's what he did. The other boy, the handsome one. Cedric.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well go on, open it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Come seek us where our voices sound. We cannot sing above the ground. An hour long you'll have to look, to recover what we took.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Myrtle, there aren't Merpeople in the black lake are there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ahhh, very good. Took Cedric ages to riddle it out. Almost all the bubbles were gone...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry, tell me again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Come seek us where our voices sound.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The black lake, that's obvious.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: An hour long you'll have to look.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Again obvious, though I must admit potentially problematic

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Potentially problematic? When was the last time you held your breath under the water for an hour Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Look Harry, we can do this. The three of us can figure it out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hate to break up this scholar session but Professor McGonagall would like to see you in her office. Not you Potter, just Weasly and Granger.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: But sir, the second task is only hours away and...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Exactly. Presumably Potter is well prepared by now and could do with a good night's sleep. Go. Now! Longbottom!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Why don't you help Potter put his books back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You know, if you're interested in plants you'd be better with Gorshok's Guide to Herbology. Do you know there's a wizard in Nepal whose growing gravity resistant trees?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Neville. No offense, but I really don't care about plants. Now if there's a Tibetan turnip that will allow me to breathe underwater for an hour then great.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I don't know about a turnip but you can always use gilliweed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You're sure about this Neville.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Absolutely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: For an hour.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Most likely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Most likely?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well there is some debate among herbologists as to the effects of freshwater versus saltwater.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You're telling me this now? You must be joking.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I just wanted to help.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well that makes you sight better than Ron and Hermione. Where are they anyway?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You seem a little tense Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Do I?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Welcome to the second task. Last night something was stolen from each of our champions. A treasure of sorts. These four treasures, one for each champion, now lie on the bottom of the black lake. In order to win each champion need only find their treasure and return to the surface. Simple enough. Except for this, they will have one hour to do so and one hour only. After that they'll be on their own.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Put that in your mouth.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You may begin at the start of the cannon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What's the matter with him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I don't know I can't see him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh my god I've killed Harry Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The Beauxbatons champion Miss Delacour has unfortunately been forced to retire. She will take no further part in this task.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: But she's my friend too!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Only one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Get him another towel.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I want all the judges over here now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You saved her, even though she wasn't yours to save. My little sister!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Thank you! And you... . You helped!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well... yeah... a bit

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Merci.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hermione

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Are you alright? You must be freezing! Personally I think you behaved admirably.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I finished last Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Next to last.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Attention! Attention! The winner is... Mr Diggory!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: For showing unique command of the bubblehead shark. The way I see it, Mr Potter would have finished first had it not been for his determination to rescue not only Mr Weasly but the others as well. We've agreed to award him second place! For outstanding moral fibre.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: All that moral fibre eh?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Blimey even when you go wrong it turns out right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well done 'moral fibre'.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Congratulations Potter, fine achievement. Well done boy. I'm sorry we haven't spoken, after all your story is one I've heard many times. Quite remarkable. Tragic of course, to lose one's family. Never whole again are we? Still, life goes on. And here we stand. I'm sure your parents would be very proud today Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bartimus! Not trying to lure Potter into one of the ministry's summer internships are we? Last boy who went into the department of ministries never came out!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: And they say I'm mad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: So I remember, I remember when I first met you all. Biggest bunch of misfits I've ever set eyes on. Always reminded me of myself a little. And here we all are, four years later.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: We're still misfits.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Maybe. But we've all got each other, and Harry of course. Soon to be! The youngest! Tri-Wizard champion there's ever been! Hooray!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Mr Crouch?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: A man has died here. And he won't be the last, you must take action.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I will not. In times like these the wizard world looks to its leaders for strength Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Then for once show them some.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The tri-wizard tournament will not be cancelled. I will not be seen as a coward.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: But surely that is what's right, no matter what others think.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What did you say? What did you say to me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me gentlemen, it may interest you to know that this conversation is no longer private.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Harry how good to see you again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I can come back later Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh not necessary Harry the minister and I are done. I'll be back in a moment. Minister, after you. Harry do feel free to indulge in a liquorice snack in my absence, but I have to warn you they're a little bit sharp.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Agh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Professor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Igor Karkaroff, you have been brought from Azkaban at your own request to present evidence to this counsel. Should your testimony prove consequential. Counsel may be prepared to order your immediate release. Until such time you remain in the eyes of the ministry a convicted deatheater. Do you accept these terms?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I do sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What do you wish to present?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I have names sir. There was a Rosier, Evan Rosier.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Mr Rosier is dead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Dead?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yeah took a piece of me with him though didn't he.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I didn't know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: If that is all the witness has to offer...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No! No! There was Rookwood, he was a spy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Augustus Rookwood? Of the department of ministries.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ya ya, the same. He passed information to you know who from inside the ministry itself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Very well. Counsel will deliberate. In the meantime you will be returned to Azkaban.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: NO! WAIT! PLEASE! I have more. Snape, Severus Snape.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The counsel is very much aware you have given evidence on this matter. Severus Snape was indeed a deatheater and prior to Lord Voldemort's downfall turned spy for us at great personal risk. Today he's no more a deatheater than I am.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's a lie! Severus Snape remains faithful to the dark lord.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Silence!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Unless the witness possesses any name of genuine consequence this session is now concluded.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh no no no no no. I heard about one more.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What's that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The name...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I know for a fact this person took part in the capture, and by means of the cruciatus curse, torture of the aurer Frank Longbottom and...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The name! Give me the wretched name!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Barty Crouch! ... Junior.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Get your hands off me you pathetic little men. Hello father.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You are no son of mine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Curiosity's not a sin Harry, but you should exercise caution. It's a pensieve, useful if like me you find your mind a wee bit stretched. It allows me to see what small things I've already seen. You see Harry I've searched and searched for something, some small detail. Something I might have overlooked, something that would explain why these terrible things have happened. Every time I get close to an answer it slips away, it's maddedning.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Sir, Mr Crouch's son, what happened to him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: He was sent to Azkaban. Destroyed Barty to do it. But he had no choice, the evidence was overwhelming. Why do you ask?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's just that I had a dream about him. It was in the summer, before school. In the dream I was in a house and Voldemort was there only he wasn't quite human, and Wormtail was there too and Mr Crouch's son.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Have there been other dreams like this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes. Always the same one. Sir... these dreams, what I see, you don't think it's actually happening do you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I think it's unwise for you to linger over these dreams Harry, I think it's best that you simply...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Cast them away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's a sign Severus, you know what it means as well as I.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Potter! What's your hurry? Congratulations, your performance in the black lake was inspiring. Gilliweed, am I correct?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Ingenious. A rather rare herb gilliweed, not something found in your every day garden. Nor is this, know what it is?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bubble juice sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Veritaserum. Three drops of this and you-know-who himself will spill his darkest secrets. The use of this on a student is regrettably forbidden, however should you ever steal from my personal stores again, my hand might just slip over your morning pumpkin juice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I haven't stolen anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Don't lie to me. Gilliweed might be innocuous, but boomslang skin? lacewing flies? You and your friends are brewing polyjuice potion and believe me I'm going to find out why.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Earlier today Professor Moody placed the tri-wizards cup deep within the maze. Only he knows its exact position. Now as Mr Diggory...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: and Mr Potter tied for first position they will be the first to enter the maze. Followed by Mr Krum...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The first person to touch the cup will be the winner. I've instructed the staff to patrol the perimeter, if at any point should a contestant wish to withdraw from the task he or she need only send up red sparks with their wands. Contestants, gather round.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: In the maze you'll find not dragons or creatures of the deep. Instead you'll face something more challenging. You see, people change in the maze. Oh find the cup if you can, but be very weary you could just lose yourselves along the way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Champions! Prepare yourselves.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
