Harry Potter.text: On the count of three... ONE...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Fleur? Fleur!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Get down!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No stop! He's bewitched Cedric.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Get off me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: He's bewitched!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You know for a moment there I thought you were gonna let it get me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: For a moment so did I.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Some game huh?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Some game.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Go. Take it, you saved me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Together, on three. One, two, three!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You ok?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Where are we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I've been here before.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's a portkey. Harry the cup is a portkey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I've been here before in a dream. Cedric, we have to get back to the cup? Now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What are you talking about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Get back to the cup!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Who are you? What do you want?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Kill the spare.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Cedric!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Do it, now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bones of the father, unwillingly given.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Flesh of the servent willingly sacrificed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Blood of the enemy forcibly taken.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The dark lord shall rise again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: My wand Wormtail.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Hold out your arm.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Master. Thank you master.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The other arm Wormtail.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Welcome my friends. Thirty years it's been, and yet you stand before me as though it were only yesterday. I confess myself disappointed, not one of you tried to find me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Not even you, Lucius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: My lord. Had I detected any sign or even a whisper of your whereabouts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: There were signs my friend, and more than whispers.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I assure you I never renounced the old ways. The face I have been obliged to present each day since your absence, that was my true mask.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I returned.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Out of fear, not loyalty. Still you have proved yourself useful these past few months Wormtail.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Thank you master, thank you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Oh, such a handsome boy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Don't touch him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry! I'd almost forgotten you were here. Standing on the bones of my father. I'd introduce you but word has it you're almost as famous as me these days. The boy who lived. How lies have fed your legend Harry. Shall I reveal what really happened that night thirteen years ago? Shall I divulge how I truly lost my powers? It was love. You see when dear sweet Lily Potter gave her life for her only son she provided the ultimate protection. I could not touch you. It was old magic, something I should have forseen. But no matter, no matter. Things have changed, I can touch you now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Astonishing what a few drops of your blood will do eh Harry? Pick up your wand Potter. I said pick it up, get up. Get up! You've been taught how to duel I presume yes? First we bow to each other. Come on now Harry the niceties must be observed, Dumbledore would not want you to forget your manners now would he? I said bow!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: That's better. And now...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Atta boy Harry, your parents would be proud. Especially your filthy mongrel mother. I'm going to kill you Harry Potter, I'm going to destroy you. After tonight no one will ever again question my powers. After tonight if they speak of you they'll speak only of how you begged for death, and I being a merciful lord obliged. Get up.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Don't you turn your back on me Harry Potter I want you to look at me when I kill you, I want to see the lights leave your eyes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Have it your way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Do nothing. He is mine to finish. He's mine!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry when the connection is broken you must get to the portkey. We can delay it for a moment to give you time but only a moment, do you understand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry take my body back will you? Take my body back to my father.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Let go. Sweetheart you're ready. Let go! Let go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Tell me what happened!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: He's back, he's back! Voldemort's back. Cedric, he asked me to bring his body back. I couldn't leave him, not there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It's alright Harry. It's alright, he's home, you both are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Keep everybody in their seats. A boy has just been killed. The body must be moved Dumbledore, there are... too many people.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Let me through! That's my son! My boy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Are you alright Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Does it hurt?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Not so much now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I'd better take a look at it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The cup was a portkey. Someone had bewitched it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: What was it like? What was he like?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: The dark lord. What was it like to stand in his presence?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I dunno. It was like I'd fallen into one of my dreams. One of my nightmares.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Were there others? In the graveyard, were there others?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Um. I don't think I said anything about a graveyard Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Marvellous creatures dragons aren't they? Do you think that miserable oaf would have led you into the woods if I hadn't suggested it? Do you think Cedric Diggory would have told you to hold the egg under the water if I hadn't have told him first myself? Do you think Neville Longbottom the witless wonder could have provided you with gilliweed if I hadn't have given him the book that led you straight to it? Huh??

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: It was you from the beginning. You put my name in the goblet of fire. You bewitched Krum. But...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You won because I made it so Potter. You ended up in that graveyard tonight because it was meant to be so. And now the deed is done. The blood that runs through these veins runs within the dark lord. Imagine how he will reward me when he learns that I have once and for all silenced the great Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Severus...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Do you know who I am?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Albus Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Are you Alastor Moody? Are ya?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Is he in this room? Is he in this room?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry get away from there!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Are you alright Alastor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry Albus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: That's Moody, but then who's...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Polyjuice potion.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Now we know who's been stealing it from your store Severus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: We'll get you up in a minute.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Barty Crouch Junior.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I'll show you mine if you show me yours.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Your arm Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: You know what this means don't you? He's back. Lord Voldemort has returned.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Send an owl to Azkaban, think they'll find they're missing a prisoner.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I'll be welcomed back like a hero.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps. Personally I've never had much time for heroes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Today we acknowledge a really terrible loss. Cedric Diggory was as you all know, exceptionally hard working, intricately fair minded. And most importantly a fierce fierce friend. I think therefore you have the right to know exactly how he died. You see, Cedric Diggory was murdered by Lord Voldemort. The ministry of magic does not wish me to tell you this. But not to do so I think would be an insult to his memory. Now the pain we all feel at this dreadful loss reminds me, reminds us that while we may come from different places and speak in different tongues, our hearts beat as one. In light of recent events the bonds of friendship we made this year will be more important than ever. Remember that and Cedric Diggory will not have died in vain, you remember that. And we'll celebrate a boy who was kind and honest and brave and true right to the very end.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: I never liked these curtains. Set them on fire in my fourth year, by accident of course. I put you in terrible danger this year Harry I'm sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Professor, when I was in the graveyard there was a moment... um... when Voldemort's wand and mine sort of connected.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Priori Incantatem. You saw your parents that night didn't you? They reappeared.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No spell can reawaken the dead Harry I trust you know that. Dark and diffiult times lie ahead. Soon we must all face the choice between what is right what is easy. But remember this, you have friends here. You're not alone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Write to me. Promise.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Bye.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Au revoir Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Do you think we'll ever just have a quiet year at Hogwarts?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: No I don't think so.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Everything's going to change now isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Promise you'll write this summer. Both of you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Well I won't. You know I won't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter.text: Harry will won't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, it's you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What should we do with him, Big D?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Big D? Cool name, but to me, you'll always be Ikkle Duddicums.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Shut up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ooo, tough guy. Not so tough in your bed, are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You boys go home now, or I'll be calling your parents!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I heard you talking in your sleep, last night. Crying. "No, don't kill Cedric, don't kill Cedric! Dad, help me, heeelp me! He's going to kill me! Boo-hoo!"

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Shut up, Dudley. I'm warning you...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why should I?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Because if you don't I'll turn you into the idiot pig you are!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Not so brave now, are you Duddykins? Now tell your little friends to go away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: G-go home!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Get out of here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't you ever speak about that again. You understand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't point that thing at me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I said, DO YOU UNDERSTAND? !

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's happening?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Quiet!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dudley! Run!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on! They break into a run. A dementor drifts into the alleyway in front of them. Skidding to a stop, Harry turns around, to find the other dementor cutting off the way back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dudley, no!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Lumos!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: "Expecto Patronum!'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Bow to death, Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Haaaaaaaarry!...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: "Expecto Patronum! '

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What the heii are those?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dementors.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What happened, Duddikins?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What the hell is a dementoid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: They didn't--?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I want some answers!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We were attacked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: By those...things?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: They're evil. If they get the chance, they'll suck your soul out through your mouth.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How do you know that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Fought 'em off, eh, Dud? Gave 'em the ol' one-two?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You can't give a Dementor the 'ol one-two.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why is he all right then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Because I used magic to save his

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Lumos!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Who are all you lot?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Quiet, Dursley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, douse the light. We're exposed here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What are you doing here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We're your advanced guard, Harry. Dumbledore just sent us as soon as he heard about the attack. We're taking you to safety. We're just waiting for the all clear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How'd he know? It just happened!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You didn't think Dumbledore'd let you wander around on your own, did you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I don't believe you've met Nymphadora Tonks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Tonks, would you go get Harry's broom from the house?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's been going on? What's Lord Vol-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We're not talking about it here, it's too risky.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Blast it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mad-eye, dear, you do realize that's disgusting?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I want 365 degree visibility on the return trip.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How are we getting there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Brooms.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There's the first signal.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Right, let's go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: On your broom, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Form up! Form up around Harry. Make it snappy! The advanced guard surrounds Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Stop being so cheerful, Mad-eye.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We must be ready. This would be the perfect moment for Voldemort to strike Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Uh, is that very likely?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No one's going to die.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There's the second signal!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mount your brooms, everyone. Here we go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The third signal, everyone. Let's

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Stay in formation!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We need more height!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Contacts to the south!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mad-eye! You, Tonks, and Lupin take Harry! We'll slow them down!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There's the other one, Alastor!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Expecto--!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, leave it to us!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: "Expecto Patronum!'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Get Harry to the safe house!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, Potter! Keep moving!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But I can help!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Potter, getting yourself killed won't do a thing. Now move!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We're not far, now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Did you get rid of them?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: They're gone, Alastor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We're there!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Prepare for descent! Form up around Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Stay here, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Clear!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Right, Harry, this way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Here, read this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, inside. Hurry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Get in, quick, Harry. Don't touch anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Filth! Scum! Half-breeds, mutants, freaks, begone from this place! How dare you befoul the house of my fathers?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Shut up, you miserable old hag! Quiet!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Blood traitor, abomination, shame of my flesh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Was that your--?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mother, yes. Dear old mum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But...why here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Harry dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mrs. Weasley!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sirius, the meeting is about to start!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, dear, go on upstairs-— quietly, if you please. They're all up there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Let him breathe, Hermione!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, Harry! We've missed you! Are you furious with us, I bet you are!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good to see you, mate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, inside.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sorry we haven't written, Harry, but Dumbledore made us promise not to.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We wanted to, mate, we really did, but he thought they would get intercepted. There is an awkward silence.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He thought you would be safest there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He was so angry when he heard. It was...scary...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So, why's he keeping me in the dark?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Didn't you bother asking?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We've only seen him twice, and not for very long. He's really busy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So I get to spend the summer with the Dursleys while you two are here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's not that fun, mate. Mum won't let us anywhere near the meetings.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You've still been here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's been going on?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We've already told you, we're not privyed to the meetings. But we do know a few things.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Some of the Order are following known Death Eaters, like Lucious Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's this Order everyone's talking about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The Order of the Phoenix. Dumbledore started it last time to fight You-Know-Who. He only reorganized it after last term.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You can come down now, the meeting's over.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Arthur-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, the Ministry is furious with you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You'll have to go to an disciplinary meeting tomorrow.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm not really hungry. I think I'll go to bed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You surprise me, Harry. I figured the first thing you'd do is start asking about Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I wanted to, but I didn't think you'd tell me anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And that was quite right, Harry! You're much to young--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He has a right to know, Molly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's not your decision!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I know what Dumbledore said, but he needs to know something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's not a child, Molly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's not an adult either!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I only have Harry's best interests at heart.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's not your son.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Who else does he have, then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's got me. He's like a son to me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What do you want to know, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Where's Voldemort? What's he doing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's hiding for the moment, because the Ministry is ignoring his return and he doesn't want that to change.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The last person You-Know-Who wanted to alert was Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And what's his plan?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's building up his army again, just like before.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And you're stopping him from gaining followers?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We're doing our best, but it's proving to be...difficult.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You see, when the Ministry of Magic insists that Voldemort isn't back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But...why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Fudge likes being Minister of Magic. If it turns out that Voldemort came back under his watch, he'll be sacked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But you're telling people, right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, they think I'm a mass- murderer, Lupin is a werewolf, Tonks and Arthur would lose their jobs at the Ministry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But Dumbledore is doing all he can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: If he keeps it up, he might end up in Azkaban. And that would give You- Know-Who a clear field to--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You-Know-Who wants something. Something he didn't have last time. A weapon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What kind of weapon?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry, Harry, we can't say anything more.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Morning, dear! Did you have a good sleep?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, my scar kept hurting.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah...nerves...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good luck, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: They'll have to let you off, Harry... You were defending

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Thanks, Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What does he get a hug for?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, sure, that's why.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Me? Jealous? Of course not, it just doesn't seem fair that you hug one friend more than the other, is all...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Would you like a hug?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, come on, Harry. Time to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Bye.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good, good, not very many Muggles.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, come on Harry, in we go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I do love using the Fellytone! Now, let's see, what's the number again...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Welcome to the Ministry of Magic. Please state your business.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter, disciplinary hearing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Pleas stand by.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Keep close, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah, Perkins, good morn-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Arthur, they've changed the time of Potter's hearing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Blast! Dumbledore thought they might try that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It started at eight!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good lord, that was five minutes ago! Come on, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Department of Mysteries.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Department of Mysteries?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yep, I've got no idea what they get up to in here, it's top secret.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've been there before...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Now, Harry, I find that highly unlikely...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There you are, Harry, in you go...good luck...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You're late.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Er...sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No matter, the accused will take his seat.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Very well, we are ready to begin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Witness for the Defence, Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah...you...er...got our message that the time had changed, did you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well. The...ah...charges.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The charges against the accused shall now be read into the record: That the accused did with deliberation and fore-knowledge of the illegality of his actions, produce a patronus charm in full sight of a Muggle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, but-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Within full sight of a Muggle?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, but-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You produced a Patronus? A fully- formed Patronus, with a clearly- defined shape?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That is most remarkable, Mr. Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It doesn't matter how impressive it was!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But I did it because of the Dementors!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What do you mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My cousin and I were attacked by Dementors. That's why I had to use the Patronus, to drive them away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah, yes, yes, another cock-and-bull story.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dementors in Little Whinging?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, come now, Susan. He's clearly lying.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We haven't got time to-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Very well. Weasley, fetch the witness.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Full name?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Arabella Doreen Figg, resident of Little Whinging.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So...what is your story?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I was sitting on my porch when I saw the two Dementors gliding towards the two boys.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What did the Dementors look like?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, they were big and wore great, tattered cloaks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Anything else?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I-I felt them. It was horrible...like I would never be happy again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Very well, you may go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Not very convincing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I disagree. She described their effects very completely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So two Dementors just happen to be in Little Whinging? I think not...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Only if the Dementors are still taking their orders from only the Ministry these days. I believe you know my views on this, Cornelius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, and they're nothing but bilge, Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, Dumbledore, but did you just accused the Ministry of Magic of ordering an attack on this boy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dementors are irrelevant!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, yes, if he's telling the truth!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Very well, all for clearing the accused of charges?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: All opposed?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Excellent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you've been let off! That's wonderful!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You were tried by the full court?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I think so, yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Er...is Percy mad at you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah...yes...I'm afraid we had a bit of a row. He, well, he sided with Fudge and the rest of us sided with Dumbledore, so Percy left.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, well, if it isn't Patronus Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What are you doing here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come now, Potter, I really don't think that private matters between the Minister and myself are any concern of yours.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Shall we continue this in your

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Certainly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: If he wanted to talk to the Minister, why down here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dunno, Harry. Some things are just beyond comprehension.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Settle down, you three!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sirius, we saw Fudge talking with Lucius Malfoy on Level Nine again. Tell Dumbledore, next time he comes in, would you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, absolutely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, I'd better be off. I've got a bewitched vomiting toilet to deal with.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: George, remember that concept. Vomiting Toilet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Right you are, Fred.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Also, I'm covering for Tonks on guard duty later tonight, so I won't be back until late.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You all right, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah...just...my scar...the pain is getting stronger.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I've got something that might interest you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This was the original Order of the Phoenix. Found it while we were cleaning.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There's Mad-eye and Dumbledore, right next to Dedalus Diggle; Marlene McKinnon, she was killed two weeks after this was taken...;

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: then there's Frank and Alice Longbottom, tortured into insanity by Death Eaters; Lupin, of course..

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My parents.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I miss them, Sirius...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I know, Harry, I know. I miss them too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's not fair that I got to spend so much time with them and you didn't...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why'd they have to die, Sirius, why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I know I'm not your father, Harry, but I'll always be there for you, if I can help it...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Kreacher, get out of here! Now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, how the old Mistress would weep to see the traitor in her house...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Who..who was that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Kreacher. He's been alone with the house for years, he's gone a bit funny.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, Ron and I, we've been named House Prefects! She hands Harry a letter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What about you, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Are you sure? I would have thought you would get one!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm sure. Nothing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So...congratulations Ron, Hermione...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, lets go back downstairs!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, do go enjoy yourselves.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What is that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes it is, it's right there!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I see them too, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Er...you are?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Luna. Luna Lovegood.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, thanks Luna.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid's cabin looks deserted.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I hope he's all right...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What if he were still on his...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What if he's still on his mission from Dumbledore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, could be.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I beg a few moments of your attention, as I have a few start of term announcements. Right off, our caretaker, the good Mr. Filch, has reminded me for what he says is the four-hundred and sixty-second time that he had an annually updated list of various banned items, usually introduced by our humour experts Fred and George Weasley...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: ... which are posted in an extensive list on the door to Mr. Filch's door.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Also, we have two staffing changes this year. Professor Grubby-Plank will be taking the post of Care of Magical Creatures post as Professor Hagrid is on...extended leave.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Additionally, we have Professor Umbridge, who has kindly agreed to fill the post of Defense Against the Dark Arts-—

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hem, hem, Headmaster, if I could address the school?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Thank you, Headmaster. Now, how are we all doing tonight? I thought I would just say a few words. I am here at the Ministry of Magic's bequest, under Educational Decree twenty-two, which states that if the Headmaster of Hogwarts is unable to fill any teaching post the Ministry shall select one for the position.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So why didn't your mum want you to come back to Hogwarts, Seamus?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Me mam didn't want me to come back to Hogwarts...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well...because of you...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What did I do?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She...well, she figure's you're, well...you're lying about You-Know- Who and Dumbledore's a right nutter...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Where'd she get that from?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No one believes me, Hedwig. No one...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm alone...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, Professor...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hmm, let's see, five points from Gryffindor for coming in late.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Now, as I was saying before Mr. Potter interrupted with his antics, your Defense Against the Dark Arts education has been rather fragmented and disjointed in your past classes, hasn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I will be following a pre-approved Ministry-prepared, theory-centered Defense lesson plan.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Copy this down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I wanted to know something about your course aims.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, they should be perfectly self- evident.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But surely the whole point of Defense against the dark arts is practical application?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Miss Granger, this class has been approved by Ministry experts. Are you a Ministry Expert?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, but-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Then you have no business challenging those who are. We will be learning about spells in a safe, risk-free environment-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But we've got O.W.L.s coming up! You expect us to do the spells with no practice?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What good's theory in the real world?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What about Lord Voldemort?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ten points from Gryffindor, Mr. Potter. Let me set the record straight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Some of you have been told that a certain dead wizard has returned. This is a lie.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It-is-NOT-a-LIE!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Potter, you have just landed yourself in detention!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So, according to you, Cedric Diggory dropped dead? Or are you calling me a murderer?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The boy's death was a tragic accident.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It was MURDER! I saw it happen!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mr Potter, you have earned yourself a week's worth of detentions!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, talk to somebody who cares.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That goes to Professor McGonagall, dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah. But she called me a liar!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good. Off you go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How can Dumbledore let that horrible woman teach? And when we're taking our OWL tests too!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You reckon she's here to spy on us?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, not us specifically, but definitely Dumbledore and the Order.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh! Sorry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, well, you're going to have to get out of it somehow. We're holding tryouts for Keeper now Wood's gone, and I wanted to have the whole team there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'll never get out of it, Angelina.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, just...don't do it again!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, Harry, shall we start on Snape's report?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Later, I've got detention.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good luck, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah, Potter. Sit down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You're going to be doing lines, tonight, Mr. Potter, and you'll be using this quill.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You will write "I will not tell lies" until I tell you to stop. Understand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There's no ink.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh...you won't need ink.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Problem, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That's enough for this evening. Same time, tomorrow, and we'll see if we can get the message to sink in a bit deeper.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hey, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Have you seen Ron? I can't find him anywhere.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, I haven't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's been acting fishy all week. He's up to something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That's enough for tonight, Potter. Let's see that hand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry! I tried out for Quidditch Keeper at the tryouts! I'm on the team!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry--bloody hell!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's got to be taken to the hospital wing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You said she was making you do lines!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She is. But the quill has some sort of spell on it. It uses blood for ink.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That old hag! She's sick!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, I'm telling anyone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I really think you should tell--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I don't need his help. I don't need anyone's help.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid's still not back yet. I hope he's all right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've asked Sirius about it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you can't write to him! Owls are being intercepted, it isn't safe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry, Hermione, I wrote it in code. Anyway, I figured I need to tell someone about Umbridge. My scar hurt again last night in detention.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Always knew she was a bit fishy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You think she's working for You- Know-Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, it's a possibility, isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I suppose so. He could have her under the Imperious Curse, though it's unlikely. Dumbledore'd know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, but Dumbledore didn't have a choice, did he? She'd been sent here by the Ministry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Greetings my children. I sense even now that many of you have already made the transition into the beyond!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Today we will be continuing our interpretation of prophetic dreams. Please divide into your groups and discuss your recent night time visions using the text as a guide.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And how long have you been at this post?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I understand you are the descendent of the famous Seer Cassandra Trelawney?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I am.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And you are the first since Cassandra to have the Second Sight?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: These things tend to skip...several...generations.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Now, if you would kindly make a prediction for me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The Inner Eye does not See upon command!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My dear boy, your dream diary, if you please!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My dear boy! My poor boy! These dreams are evil portends!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, yes, oatmeal! Are you telling me you cannot see the signs? The foretelling of suffering and death?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Er...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps you are not as in the beyond as the others.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, if that's the best you can do, Professor, I will be going.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Where are we going, Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There we are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: "The Hog's Head," Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, I'll explain in a minute.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, what's going on?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: These are some people I mentioned my Defense Against the Dark Arts idea with.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You mean about us teaching ourselves?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hey, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hey, Neville.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Uh...same to you, Luna.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hear, hear!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Obviously, this will help us pass our O.W.L.s, but more importantly, it gives us the ability to protect ourselves from...Lord Voldemort. Several people jump or wince in fear at the name.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That's the first time you've said his name.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How do we know You-Know-Who's really back?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore believes he is.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You mean Dumbledore believes him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That's true, but I think we're drifting from the purpose--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's okay, Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I believe Voldemort's back because I fought him last year. Dumbledore's already told the school that. If you didn't believe him you won't believe anyone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well...anyway...uh, I think that in order to learn properly we'll need a teacher.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But we're all students. None of us has the experience to--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Someone here does. Everyone looks at her. She is staring directly at Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I for one would like to know why Potter's qualified and the rest of us aren't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: One of the portraits said you'd killed a Basilisk in the Chamber of Secrets with that sword in Dumbledore's office.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Uh...well, yeah, I did.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Blimey, Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Wow...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Can't forget that he saved the Sorcerer's Stone from You-Know-Who in his first year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And last year he got through the Triwizard Tournament!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Not to mention you dueled with You- Know-Who all alone and he still couldn't kill you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And you fought off those dementors that attacked you this summer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So all in favor of taking lessons from Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Where are we going to meet?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What about an unused classroom?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That might work. I'll look into that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ok, good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I think we should put our names down, so we know who was here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I don't know...if it were found...I mean, Umbridge wouldn't like what we're doing...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Honestly, Ernie, do you think I'd just leave it lying around? Besides, its enchanted.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Also, what should we call ourselves?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What about the Anti-Unbridhe League?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I think it should be Dumbledore's Army. There is excited agreement. Harry smiles at her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We'll let you know when we're going

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I think that went well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And did you see Cho, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, she couldn't keep her eyes off you, could she?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you won't believe...that Umbridge woman...this is too much!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's she done now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Follow me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: "By order of the Hogwarts High Inquisitor: All student organizations, societies, teams, groups, and clubs are henceforth disbanded. Permission to reform must be approved by High Inquisitor Umbridge. No student organization can exist without the knowledge and approval of the High Inquisitor. Any student found to be a part of an illegal organization will be expelled immediately."

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She refused to allow us to reform the Gryffindor team. We had to go to Dumbledore to get her to allow it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Not only that, but what about the

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This isn't a coincidence.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She knows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She can't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Look, we don't know how many people could have overheard our meeting and told her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Or somebody at the meeting could have blabbed to her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, they couldn't have. The parchment we all signed was enchanted, like I said. No one can betray the D.A. without us knowing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What would we do without you, Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hedwig!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She's hurt!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She doesn't look very good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you'd better take her to Professor Grubby-Plank. She'll know what to do.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Where on earth are you going at this time of night?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's Hedwig. I think she's been attacked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, I think you might be right, Potter. She looks at Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: London.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, give her to me. I'll run her

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There you are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Bear in mind, Potter, that channels of communication in and out of Hogwarts are being watched, won't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good. Now, off to bed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Harry Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dobby! What are you doing here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dobby is cleaning, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What is it, Dobby.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dobby...Dobby wishes he could help Harry Potter. Dobby has heard him muttering in his sleep.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry about it, Dobby. But I don't think you can help me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Actually, there is something you can do, Dobby.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I need a room where twenty-eight people can practice Defense Against the Dark Arts without the teachers knowing. Especially Professor Umbridge.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dobby knows of the perfect place, Harry Potter! It is the Room of Requirement, sir. You can only use the room in times of great need. Whatever you need will be there for you, Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That's brilliant, Dobby!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dobby can show you now, if you wish, Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Better not, Dobby. School is pretty intense right now. We'll do it ina few months, before the holidays.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: ...and Slytherin is up forty to ten. Alica with the quaffle!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Weasley is our King, Weasley is our King, He always lets the Quaffle in, Weasley is our King!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Just ignore them, Ron!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I should thank you, Weasley. You're definitely our best player!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, are you all right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Bet you loved that, Potter! Saved Weasley's neck, didn't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've never seen a worse Keeper! Maybe we should add some more verses to our little song. About his filthy mother!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And his pathetic loser of a father too!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But then, you like the Weasleys, don't you? How can you stand the stink? I guess it reminds you of your own dear mother!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Impedimenta!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't make me stupify you, Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My office. Now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: In all my thirty-nine years at this school, I have never seen such a disgusting display.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Malfoy provoked us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
