Harry Potter.text: Of course he wanted to provoke you! He'd just lost!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I cannot express in words the disappointment I feel right now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What is it, Dolores?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I thought you might need some additional authority in dealing with these two.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You thought wrong. Now kindly remove yourself from my office.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Now, I don't care what Malfoy said. Your performance out there was shameful. Fifty points from Gryffindor, and I'm giving you both a week's worth of detentions.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I hardly think that's an adequate punishment for this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Educational Decree Twenty-Five. It gives me, as High Inquisitor, the power to give punishments and privileges, and to alter those given out to students by other members of the staff.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So, I think a life-long ban from playing quidditch should do the trick for both of these. Oh, and this one's twin as well. He was going to attack Malfoy as well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ban us...for life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, indeed, Mr. Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah, I'll take your brooms as well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, have a wonderful day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You've--!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My hands are tied, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I can't believe it...three players banned for life in one day...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm going to resign.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You can't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm horrible! I should never have joined.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: If you quit, we'll be out four players!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This is the worst day of my life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I know something that could cheer you up.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid's back!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid, what happened to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've fine, I tell yeh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come off it, Hagrid! We're not blind!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Can' answer tha', I'm afraid. Top secret, that is. Business of the Order.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We know you were looking for giants, Hagrid. Dumbledore said so last year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Well, yeah, I was, then. Went with Madame Maxime. Took us a month to get to their camp.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: A month?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: O' course! Can' do magic, not with the Ministry followin' us all the way. Plus, giants aren't fond o' wizards. Don' trust 'em.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So what did you do when you found them?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So...no giants are coming?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, not righ' away. We brought our message, an' I expec' a fair few'll remember it afore teh end comes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Glad to see all of you could find this place all right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hey, Harry, what is all this stuff?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Loads of Defense Against the Dark Arts equipment. Hopefully we'll be able to get to all of it before the end of term.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh please. Professor Lockhart taught us that in second year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Lockhart didn't teach as much as prune himself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Besides, it works. I used it against You-Know-Who last June. It saved my life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Right. Well, let's split into pairs and give it a go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well done, Neville!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Look here, you lot! Neville's really got the hang of this one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I did it! I did it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Never forget this spell, Neville. It could save your live some day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Okay, everyone. We've done a lot today, and I've seen some great improvement. That's it for now. We'll meet back here, same time next week!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's wrong with him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Get McGonagall! Go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry! HARRY!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Wake up, Potter. Wake up. Please...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Weasley's been attacked!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You dreamed this, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, I saw it happen! I...I was there...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You're sure this happened, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We're going to see the Headmaster, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Professor McGonagall, and...ah...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What can I do for you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, Potter has had some kind of nightmare...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How did you see this? How were you positioned when you saw it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Uh...I was the snake. I saw it from the snake's perspective.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Is Arthur seriously injured?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You were listening?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Naturally.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Raise the alarm. We must make sure Arthur is found by the right people.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Many of our previous headmasters and mistresses have portraits in other institutions, allowing them to move between them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Fawkes, we will need a warning.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Naturally, naturally.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What news?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I shouted until someone came. They carried him up seconds ago. He doesn't look good. Covered in blood...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore, I've just seen them arrive at St. Mungos. Apperated there moments ago. He looks really bad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Minerva, the rest of the Weasleys will need to be awoken.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Phineas.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Phineas, I need you to visit your other portrait. Tell Sirius what happened and that we are coming to stay for a while.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's late, Dumbledore...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm going, I'm going...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sit, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: As you are well aware, I will be teaching you Occlumency. The headmaster feels you should learn this form of magic to defend yourself against the Dark Lord, who is skilled at Legilimency.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's that, Professor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Legilimency is the ability to extract thoughts and feelings from others.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort can read minds?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: As usual, you have all the subtlety of a stone wall, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The mind is not a book, of which any page can be examined. The mind is complex and multi-layered.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So he could read our minds right now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But hasn't it helped so far? I mean, it saved Mr. Weasley's life, didn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, it did, but at the expense of our advantage. The connection between you was so powerful during your vision of the snake that the Dark Lord became aware of it. The Headmaster fears that he may try to use this to his advantage, to manipulate you through false visions.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Wand out, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You may use any spell you can think of to try and repel me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What are you going to do?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I am going to break into your mind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, you stopped me eventually. Ideally, you should repel me with your mind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Clear your mind, Potter. Abandon

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've been there before...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What was that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've just realized...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Realized what, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's in the Department of Mysteries, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What did you say?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That corridor, I've been dreaming about it for months...it leads to the Department of Mysteries, I'm sure of it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There are many things in the Department of Mysteries, Potter, none of which concern you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I can do whatever I wish!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This is my home!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Not anymore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Now remove yourself from this castle!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I have the authority, Headmaster!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I agree with you, Professor Umbridge. You do have the power to dismiss my teachers. However...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: -..-You cannot send them from this

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And what of her quarters when I appoint a new teacher.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Happily, that will not be necessary. I have found a successor

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: ...the Ministry can only appoint new teachers if I cannot find one. I think you will find him suitable enough.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This is Firenze.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So you're saying this weapon You- Know-Who's after is in the Department of Mysteries?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's got to be.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That's got to be what Surgis Podmore was doing in the Ministry when he was arrested.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Probably. Mr. Weasley was probably there when he was attacked, too. That must be what the Order's guarding!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But why the Department of Mysteries?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It makes perfect sense, Ron. It's got to be something the Ministry's been developing. Something top secret.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Look at this. There's been a mass escape from Azkaban.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: They're all Death Eaters!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Since I had received information some time ago that Potter and a number of other students had met in the Hog's Head to start an illegal group--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm not sure that's true, Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: In point of fact, when young Potter met those students it was not illegal.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But two days later, Educational Decree Twenty-Four was introduced.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Again, quite correct. However, I wonder if you have any evidence that proves this group has been meeting since then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I have a witness right here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Correct again. I must confess that I was, however, under the impression that this young girl only told you a meeting was going on tonight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Let's ask her, shall we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You can shake your head for an

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What do you mean by shaking your head, girl?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But what about Potter? He was the

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why are you shaking your head, girl?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Again, I cannot have you manhandling my students, Professor Umbridge.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My apologies, Headmaster. I forgot myself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, what about the meeting tonight?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So, Dumbledore, you've been behind this whole thing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, Minister. You've caught me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This has all been your doing! You've been recruiting students for your army!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Quite correct, Cornelius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I knew it! I KNEW it! You've been plotting against me all this time!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This is too good to be true!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Professor, no!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Quiet, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, shut up, Potter. So, you'll be coming with us to the Ministry--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah, yes. I was wondering when we'd hit that little snag.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I see no snag, Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But I do. You seem to be laboring under the delusion that I would 'come quietly.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Resisting arrest, now are you, Dumbledore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You would really take on two Aurors, Dolores, and myself, Dumbledore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Naturally. All of you did rather well on your spellwork at this school, but if you attempt to take me in by force, I'm afraid I shall have to hurt you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Are you all right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, we're fine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm not going into hiding. Fudge will soon regret removing me from Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm so sorry, Professor!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's fine. Now listen to me, Harry. Keep studying Occlumency! Do everything Professor Snape tells you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Close your mind! You will understand, in time. Fudge is stirring.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Lay back down. They must not think we have had time to talk.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Find him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: "By Order of the Ministry of Magic: Dolores Jane Umbridge will replace Albus Dumbledore as Head of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry."

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My first act as your new Headmistress is to form an Inquisitional Squad, lead by Draco Malfoy. They will report directly to me about the goings on in the halls of this school.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Furthermore, our good caretaker, Mr. Filch has requested we reinstate the 'old punishments.' I have decided that there is no reason we shouldn't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Are you sure you can't? Hagrid said it was important.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No way. Quidditch practice. If I don't show up, Angelina'll go mad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid...we've been walking for a good hour.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Its jus' up ahead, here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Could you tell us what it is, Hagrid, please?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: All righ'. Well, I'm showin' yeh this, because tha' Umbridge woman put me on probation. I can' last much longer afore I get sacked like Trelawney.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We won't let her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Of course we'll help.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Knew yeh'd say yes!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Okay, real quiet like from here on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There we are!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid, I thought none of them wanted to come!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: None o' them did, Hermione! I didn' have much ruddy choice inna matter! I couldn' leave 'im!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, why, Hagrid? Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's me brother!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, half-brother anyway. Me mum had 'im afore she died.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Here. I'll introduce yeh to Grawp!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeh all righ', Grawp?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Look wha' I brough' yeh, Grawpy! Two new friends an' all. We 'ave Harry Potter here, see? An' over here is Hermy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hermy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Bad Grawpy! Bad boy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We don' attack our friends, Grawpy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: See, he don' know any better.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Anyway, all yeh need teh do is go an' talk to 'im. Give 'ima bit o' company.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh blimey...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I thought we told you that you were no longer welcome in this place, Hagrid. You or that beast you brought from afar.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: S'not up to you who comes and goes in this forest.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You stopped us from invoking our punishments on Firenze for becoming the servant of the humans at

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Stopped yeh from committin' murder, yeh mean!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, you'll tolerate 'im as long as he's here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We allow you to pass this time, Hagrid, because you have young with you. But the next time you enter this forest, your life is forfeit.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Have you been practicing, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, we shall see, won't we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Put that away, James.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm bored. Wish it was full moon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Easy for you to say.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This should cheer you up, Sirius. Look. Sirius grins.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: All right, there, Snivellus?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Impedimenta!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You just wait...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And now, the moment you've all been waiting for--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Leave him alone, James Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Another charity case, Lily?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What has he done to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Nothing. It's more the fact that he exists, you see...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Semper-——

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Levicorpus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Leave him alone, Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I will if you go out with me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I wouldn't go out with you if it were a choice between you and the giant squid! Now let him down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Locomotor mortis!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I said, leave him alone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't make me hex you, Lily.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Then let him go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Fine!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You're lucky Lily was here, Snivellus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I don't need help from a mud-blood like her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Apologize to her! Now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't make him apologize. Honestly, you're as bad as he is!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I would never call you that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You make me sick, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Lily! Hey Lily!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Having fun, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Been enjoying yourself?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Amusing man, your father...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I--sorry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You will repeat what you saw to no

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, of course not!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You had better not, Potter, or you will experience a pain so horrible you will wish you had never been born!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Now get out of my sight! Do not set foot in this office ever again!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Can you reach it? Can you take it for me, Black?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I would rather die!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, you will die. Eventually. But there are hours, even days of pain awaiting you before then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm going to enjoy this, Black. I have you, and soon I shall have the weapon. And then not even your pathetic Order can stand in my way! Voldemort laughs, a horrible spine-chilling laugh.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Are you all right, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Pressure of exams. It happens. Take a breath, and maybe you'll be ready to go back in. Time is nearly up, but--—

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No--no, I've done all I can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You all right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort! He's got Sirius! In the Department of Mysteries!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How do you know?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I just saw it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How're we going to get there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: To the Department of Mysteries?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We've got to do something!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How'd Voldemort get into the Ministry of Magic without being seen? I mean, he and Sirius are the two most wanted wizards in the world...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah. They can't just waltz into the Ministry of Magic!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It just seems so unlikely, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I won't let Sirius die!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: We heard Harry yelling. What's up?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort's broken into the Department of Mysteries. He's got Sirius there!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Think, Harry! Voldemort knows you! He knows you'd rush off to save Sirius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There isn't anyone else, Hermione! Everyone from the Order is gone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Anything we can do to help?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No, there isn't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes, they can, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Before we do anything, we need to establish that Sirius really isn't at Headquarters. Which means we'll need to break into Umbridge's office.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Might be able to.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Just give us a few seconds.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Mind you, it's got to be really good!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's been too quiet around here

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

Harry Potter.text: Seize him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Minister, you have just seen You- Know-Who in the flesh only seconds ago! It is time to come to your senses!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: If you insist on trying to arrest me, I am perfectly willing demonstrate how useless such an attempt will be.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore, what the blazes happened here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I will explain everything, Minister. Just as soon as I return Harry to school.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's he doing here? And what's happened to him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Minister, you will order the removal of Dolores Umbridge from my school.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: All Educational Decrees will be nullified and you will call off the search on Hagrid so he can return to work.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I will return here later tonight, after I have seen to Harry. It should not take long. He taps the Golden centaur head.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Portus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore, I want some answers!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: The Second War has begun, Minister.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Thank you...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Please sit, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I understand how you feel, Harry--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No you don't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You forget that Sirius was my friend too. You are not the only person on this earth capable of feelings, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There is no shame in feeling pain, Harry. It is your greatest strength...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You don't have a clue! You can't possibly know!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What can't I know?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This pain is part of being human, Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I don't care! I don't care!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You do care. You care so much you feel like you will bleed to death because of it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Let me out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You can't keep me in here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I daresay I can. And if you actually do attack me with that wand, Harry, I'm afraid to say you will regret it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It is my fault Sirius died tonight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I owe you this explanation, to show you the failings of an old man.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I already know all this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Haven't you wondered why I haven't spoken to you, even looked at you, for months?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Well, yeah, I did...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sirius told me you believed there was a snake inside of you. This was Voldemort attempting to manipulate you. To protect you from this, I had you study Occlumency.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But Snape stopped giving me lessons.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes. I thought he could overcome his feelings towards your father, but I was wrong. Some wounds cut too deep to be healed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He barely taught me, though. I always felt more open to it after the lessons. Like he was trying to open me to Voldemort—-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I would trust Severus Snape with my life, Harry. You have never recovered from your mistrust of him in your first year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sirius didn't trust him. Didn't believe he'd really turned to our side...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Again, some wounds run too deep to be healed, Harry. Severus and Sirius never liked each other at school. This has never changed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: During your Occulumency lessons, Professor Snape discovered that you were dreaming about the door in the Department of Mysteries.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've been dreaming about that all year, before Voldemort discovered the connection.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes. Voldemort has been obsessed with hearing that prophesy since he returned. Because of your scar, what he was obsessed with, you were obsessed with, in the form of dreams.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Once he discovered the connection, Voldemort had little difficulty in manipulating you into thinking he had captured Sirius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But I checked Grimmauld Place! Kreacher said--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Kreacher lied. He wanted you to go to the Department of Mysteries.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Kreacher has been serving two masters for some months now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Wait, where was Sirius when I tried to contact him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Ah. Apparently Kreacher had injured Buckbeak to distract him in case you tried to contact Headquarters.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sirius was tending to the wounds when you called.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And Hermione said we should be nice to Kreacher!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She was quite right, Harry. Kreacher is what wizards have made him. He is to be pitied, not hated.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sirius hated him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He didn't hate Kreacher himself. Kreacher was a reminder to Sirius of the home he had always hated.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, he really hated that place. And you kept him locked up in there!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I was trying to save his life!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I also knew that Voldemort would return one day. I played to his weakness. There is an ancient magic which Voldemort has always underestimated.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: This magic is what your mother gave you when she died. That protection would only work, however, if you were cared for by a blood relative. Your Aunt, Petunia.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: She never loved me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps not. But she took you in, however grudgingly. As long as you can call your Aunt's house your home, you are protected.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And now we come to the moment of terrible truth, the moment I have dreaded for fifteen years. The moment when I must lay another burden atop your already straining shoulders.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Do you remember your first year here? When you lay in the hospital wing fresh from your confrontation with Voldemort?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Do you remember what you asked me that night?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I asked you why Voldemort tried to kill me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: You have no idea the pain it causes me to tell it to you, even now. But unfortunately, I must.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I don't understand, Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Professor, why am I so important to

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: An excellent question, Harry. The answer lies in the prophesy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sir, it got smashed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That was not the only place the Prophesy is preserved.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: "The One with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches....Born to

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm not sure I understand all that, sir...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: And...it means me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Interestingly, there were two boys whom the prophesy could have been referring to. You and Neville Longbottom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: So it's not necessarily me, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What if he chose wrong?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why didn't he wait? Why attack when we were babies?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort had an informant listening to my meeting with Professor Trelawney. Fortunately he was discovered before he could hear the entire prophesy. Voldemort had to act immediately, he didn't know the rest of the prophesy. All he knew was that he had to destroy the child who would grow to be a threat to his power.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But I don't have any special powers.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There is a room in the Department of Mysteries which is kept locked at all times. It contains a force so wonderful and yet terrible that it is greater than death itself. It is that power which you have incredible amounts of and of which Voldemort has none.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What is it, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: There is only the end of the prophesy which we haven't addressed. It states "neither can live while the other survives."

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It is the final burden which I must place on you, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: One of us has to kill the other...in the end.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hey, Nick.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I--Well, Madam Pomfrey asked me to tell you that Hermione and Ron are out of the hospital wing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Nick, I was wondering about something?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've been expecting this...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Expecting what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: A lot of people come to me when they've lost loved ones.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I expect so...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: He's not coming back, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry I couldn't be of more

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: How are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Good as new, mate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Better.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Come on, let's go in to the feast.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've got something to tell you. Something important.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: But not right now. I'm not ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Take your time, Harry. We'll be here when you are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's the last night and I need to pack.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh, people take my things and hide them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I don't think they like me much. Some of them call me "Loony" Lovegood.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Do you need any help looking?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Oh no. It all turns up in the end.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Sirius Black. Hermione said he was your Godfather.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: My mother. I was nine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: It's okay. It's not like I'll never see her again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Don't tell me you didn't hear them. The voices beyond the Veil?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: They were just out of sight, that's all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Of course. Anyway, my mum always said the things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end. If not always in the way we expect. Think I'll just go have some pudding.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: I've been thinking about something Dumbledore said to me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: What's that ?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: That even though we've got a fight ahead of us we've got one thing that Voldemort doesn't have.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Yeah ?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter.text: Something worth fighting for

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Narcissa!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Cissy! You mustn't do this.  He can't be trusted.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The Dark Lord trusts him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The Dark Lord is mistaken.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Or so I believe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, who can one trust these days?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He lives in this Muggle dunghill?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Run along, Wormtail.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I've nowhere else to turn, Severus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You must be joking.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know I ought not to be here. The Dark Lord himself has forbidden me to speak of this --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: If the Dark Lord has forbidden it, you ought not to speak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Put it down, Bella.  We mustn't touch what isn't ours. As it so happens I'm aware of your situation, Narcissa.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You? The Dark Lord told you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Your sister doubts me, Narcissa. Understandable.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Over the years I have played my part well.  So well I've deceived one of the greatest wizards of all time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore is a great wizard. Only a fool would question it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I... I don't doubt you, Severus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You should feel honored, Cissy. As should Draco --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He's just a boy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I can't change the Dark Lord's mind.  But it might be possible for me to help Draco.  To provide some... protection.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you mean it, Severus?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I can try.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh, Severus, please, if you would... I would be forever in your debt.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Swear to it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Make the Unbreakable Vow. You see.  It's just empty words. Oh he'll try.  He'll give it his best effort.  But when it matters most he'll slither back into his hole.  Bloody coward...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Take out your wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Will you, Severus Snape, watch over Draco Malfoy as he attempts to fulfill the Dark Lord's wishes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I will.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And will you, to the best of your ability, protect him from harm?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I will.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And should it prove necessary, if it seems Draco will fail... will you yourself carry out the deed that the Dark Lord has ordered Draco to perform?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I will.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter.  Who's Harry Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh.  Um.  No one.  Bit of a tosser.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Funny that paper of yours.  Couple nights ago, I could swear I saw one of the pictures move.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Really.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Thought I'd gone round the twist.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hey.  I was wondering...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Eleven.  That's when I get off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I once knew a Muggle girl from Liverpool with hair like spun silk.  No light could resist it...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I like riding round on the trains. It takes my mind off... things.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Rather unpleasant to behold, isn't it?  The tale is thrilling if I do say so myself, but I'm afraid now is not the time to tell it.  Take my arm.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I just Apparated, didn't I?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Indeed.  And quite successfully I might add.  Most people vomit their first time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Can't imagine why...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Welcome to the charming village of Budleigh Babberton, Harry.  I assume right about now you're wondering why I've brought you here, am I right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: After all these years, I just sort of roll with it, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Wand out, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Lumos...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Horace!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Merlin's Beard!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: There's no need to disfigure me, Albus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I must say, you make a very convincing armchair, Horace.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's all in the upholstery. I come by the stuffing naturally. What gave me away?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dragon's blood.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, well, I couldn't very well use wizard's blood, could I?  Oho!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah yes.  Introductions.  Harry, this is an old friend and colleague of mine, Horace Slughorn.  Horace, this is, well, you know who this is. Apparently there's some thought he may be the Chosen One.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So why all the theatrics, Horace? You weren't perhaps expecting someone else, were you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: S-someone else?  I'm sure I don't know what you mean.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh all right!  The Death Eaters have been trying to recruit me for over a year.  Do you know what that's like?  One can only say no to these people so many times before they...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Take matters into their own hands?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I never stay anywhere more than a week.  The Muggles who own this place are in the Canary Islands.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, I think it should be put back in order for them, don't you? Mind?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That was fun.  May I use the loo?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't think I don't know why you're here, Albus!  The answer is still no!  Absolutely, unequivocally no!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You look very like your father. Except for your eyes.  You've got --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: My mother's eyes, yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Lily.  Lovely Lily.  She was exceedingly bright -- your mother. Even more impressive when one considers she was Muggle-born.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: One of my best friends is Muggle- born.  She's the best in our year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh, but you mustn't think I'm prejudiced!  No, no, no! Your mother was one of my absolute favorites!  Look, there she is. Right up front.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All mine, each and every one.  Ex- students, I mean.  You recognize Barnubas Cuffe, of course, editor of the Daily Prophet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Always takes my owl should I want to register my opinion on the news of the day.  And there's Ambrosius Flume of Honeydukes.  Sends a hamper of chocolate to the house each birthday.  That is, when I had a house.  And Gwenog Jones, captain of the Holyhead Harpies -- free tickets whenever I want them. Of course, I haven't been to a match in some time...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah yes.  Regulus Black.  You no doubt know of his older brother Sirius.  Died a few weeks ago.  I taught the whole Black family except Sirius.  Shame.  Talented boy.  I got Regulus when he came along, of course, but I'd have liked the set.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Mind if I take this?  I do love knitting patterns.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Of course.  But you're not leaving?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think I know a lost cause when I see one.  Regrettable.  I would have considered it a personal triumph had you consented to return to Hogwarts, Horace.  You are, like my friend Mr. Potter -- one of a kind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All right!  I'll do it.  But I'll be wanting Professor Merrythought's old office, not that water closet I had formerly. And I expect a raise!  These are mad times we live in!  Mad!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Indeed they are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir, exactly what was that all --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You are talented, famous and powerful -- everything Horace values.  Professor Slughorn is going to try to collect you, Harry.  You would be his crowning jewel.  That is why he is returning to Hogwarts.  And it is crucial he return...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I fear I may have stolen a wondrous night from you, Harry. She was, truthfully, very pretty. The girl.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's alright, sir.  I'll go back tomorrow, make some excuse --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You'll not be going back to Little Whinging tonight, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But, sir.  What about Hedwig?  And there's my trunk --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Both are waiting for you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hedwig...?  Mum!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Exactly.  How'd you guess?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm joking, Mum.

Harry Potter.text: A hundred and fifty.  Give or take a few years.

Harry Potter.text: C'mon. Let's go.

Harry Potter.text: Hi.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dunno.  Let's get closer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Please.  What's a Wrackspurt?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: They're invisible creatures that float in through your ears and make your brain go fuzzy. Quibbler?  Quibbler?

Harry Potter.text: Don't you see, it was a ceremony. An initiation.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Stop, Harry, I know where you're going with this --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's happened.  He's one of them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: One of what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry is under the impression that Draco Malfoy is now a Death Eater.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're barking.  What would You- Know-Who want with a sod like Malfoy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So what's he doing in Borgin and Burke's?  Browsing for furniture?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's a creepy shop.  He's a creepy bloke.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hogwarts.  What a pathetic excuse for a school.  I think I'd pitch myself off the Astronomy Tower if I thought I had to continue on for another two years.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Enjoy the ride back to London.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sorry I made you miss the carriages, Luna.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I am your friend, Luna.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's nice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor Flitwick, you've known me for five years.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No exceptions, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who are those people?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Aurors. For security.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It was his father's.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Is my father's.  He's not dead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's alright, Mr. Filch.  I can vouch for Mr. Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Nice face, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Would you like me to fix it? Personally I think you look a bit more devil-may-care this way.  But it's up to you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Episkey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Brilliant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Where've you been, Harry?  And what happened to your face?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sorting Hat urged us all to be brave and strong in these troubled times -- easy for it to say -- it's a hat, isn't it?  First Years seemed to enjoy it, though. Wankers. Filch give you the wand outside?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Thanks...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The very best of evenings to you! First off, please join me in welcoming the newest member of our staff, Horace Slughorn.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor Slughorn, I'm happy to say, has agreed to resume his old post of Potions master.  Meanwhile the post of Defense Against the Dark Arts will be assumed by Professor Snape.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now, as you know, each and every one of you was searched upon your arrival tonight.  You have a right to know why.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Once there was a young man who, like you, sat in this very Hall. Walked this castle's corridors. Slept beneath its roof.  He seemed, to all the world, a student like any other.  His name? Tom Riddle. The Hall goes utterly silent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Today, of course, the world knows him by another name.  Which is why, as I stand looking out upon you all tonight, I am reminded of a sobering fact.  Each day, every hour, this very minute perhaps, dark forces attempt to penetrate this castle.  But in the end, their greatest weapon remains... you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Just something to keep in mind. Now, off to bed.  Pip pip!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That was cheerful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: History of Magic is up, ladies, not down.  Mr. Davies -- that's the girl's toilet...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This can't be good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Enjoying ourself, are we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, you see, I've got an open period this morning, Professor --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So I noticed.  I would think you'd want to fill it with Potions.  Or is it no longer your ambition to become an Auror?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It is.  Or was.  But I was told I had to get an Outstanding in my

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And so you did when Professor Snape was teaching Potions. However, Professor Slughorn is perfectly happy to accept N.E.W.T. students with 'Exceeds Expectations.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Really?  Well... brilliant.  I'll head there straight away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good.  And take Weasley with you. He looks far too happy over there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But I don't want to take Potions!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry m'boy!  I was beginning to worry!  And I see we've brought someone with us...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ron Weasley, sir.  But I'm dead awful at Potions, a menace actually, so I probably should just be going --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Nonsense, we'll sort you out.  Any friend of Harry's is a friend of mine.  Right then, books out --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Um, sorry, sir, but I haven't got my book yet -- nor's Ron.  You see --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Not to worry.  You can get what you need from the cupboard.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now, as I was saying, I've prepared a few concoctions this morning.  Any ideas what these might be?  Yes, Miss...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Granger, sir.  That one there is Veritaserum.  And that would be Polyjuice Potion.  And that is Amortentia! The most powerful love potion in the world.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's rumored to smell differently to each person, according to what attracts them.  For example, I smell freshly mown grass and new parchment and spearmint toothpaste --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: One of my best friends is Muggle- born.  She's the best in our year...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now Amortentia doesn't create actual love, of course.  That's impossible.  But it does cause a powerful infatuation or obsession. For that reason, it is probably the most dangerous potion in this room.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir, you haven't told us what's in that one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah yes...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What you see before you, ladies and gentlemen, is a curious little potion known as Felix Felicis. But it is more commonly referred to as --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Liquid luck.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Miss Granger.  Desperately tricky to make.  Disastrous should you get it wrong.  But brewed correctly, as this has been, it has remarkable powers.  One sip and you will find that all your endeavors succeed... at least until the effects wear off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But then why don't people drink it all the time?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Because taken in excess it causes giddiness, recklessness and dangerous overconfidence.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Have you ever taken it, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Twice.  Once when I was twenty- four.  Once when I was fifty- seven.  Two tablespoons taken at breakfast.  Two perfect days...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So.  This is what I offer each of you today.  One tiny vial of liquid luck... to the student who, in the hour that remains, manages to brew an acceptable Draught of Living Death, the recipe for which can be found on page ten of your textbook.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You should know that in all the years of my previous tenure at Hogwarts, not once did a student brew a potion of sufficient quality to claim this prize.  In any event -- good luck.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How did you do that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Crush it.  Don't cut it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  The instructions specifically say to cut.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  Really --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Merlin's Beard!  But it's perfect. So perfect I daresay one sip would kill us all!  Your mother was a dab hand at potions, but this... My, my, what can't you do, m'boy? Perhaps you will save us all in the end...
