Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Here you are then, as promised. One bottle of Felix Felicis.  Use it well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good evening, Harry.  You got my message, I see.  Come, come.  Sit.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So.  How are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Fine, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Enjoying your classes?  Professor Slughorn, for one, is most impressed with you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think he overestimates my abilities, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Definitely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And what of your activities outside the classroom?  Do they bring you satisfaction?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I notice you spend a great deal of time with Miss Granger.  One can't help but wonder if --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No!  I mean... she's brilliant. And we're friends.  But... no.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Forgive me, Harry, I...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: ... I was merely curious. In any event, I'm sure you're wondering why I've summoned you here tonight.  The answer lies here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What you see before you are memories.  In this case pertaining to one individual:  Voldemort.  Or as he was known then... Tom Riddle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This vial contains a most particular memory -- of the day I first met him.  I'd like you to see it.  If you would...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I must confess to a bit of confusion upon receiving your letter, Mr. Dumbledore.  In all the years Tom's been here, he's never once had a family visitor. Frankly, I was stunned to find that someone knew of his existence.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I am not family.  But his name has been known to me since birth.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I see...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think I should tell you.  He's a funny boy -- Tom.  Odd.  There have been incidents with the other children.  Nasty things.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps you could give me an example.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You've got a visitor, Tom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How do you do, Tom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, I'll leave you two to yourselves.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: As you wish.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're the doctor, aren't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  I am a Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't believe you.  I hear Mrs. Cole talking, her and the rest of the staff.  They want me looked at.  They think I'm different.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps they're right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm not mad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hogwarts is not a place for mad people.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's a school.  A school of... magic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You can do things, can't you, Tom? Things the other children can't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Tell me some of the things you can do, Tom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I can make things move -- without touching them.  I can make animals do what I want without training them.  I can make bad things happen to people who are mean to me.  I can make them hurt... if I want.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm like you, Tom.  Different.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Prove it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think there is something trying to get out of your wardrobe, Tom. Open it.  Open.  It.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Take it out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Is there anything in that box you ought not to have?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why did you want these things, Tom?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I like having things that belonged to other people.  It makes me feel ... close to them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Thievery is not tolerated at Hogwarts.  At Hogwarts, you will be taught not only how to use magic, but to control it. Understood? I'll be going now, Tom.  Leave your window open tonight.  An owl will bring you a message.  Read it carefully.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I can speak to snakes too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: They find me.  Whisper things.  Is that normal.  For someone like me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It is unusual.  But not unheard of.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Did you know, sir?  Then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Did I know that I had just met the most dangerous Dark Wizard of all time?  No.  Had I...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Over time, while here at Hogwarts, Tom Riddle grew close to one particular teacher.  Can you guess which teacher that might be?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You didn't bring Professor Slughorn back simply to teach Potions, did you, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  I did not.  You see, Professor Slughorn possesses something I desire very dearly. And he will not part with it easily... I'd rather not divulge any more just yet, Harry.  But I promise. In time you will know everything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You said Professor Slughorn would try to collect me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I did.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you want me to let him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All right!  Queue up!  Excuse me...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Shut It!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Thanks.  All right.  This morning I'll be putting you all through a few drills to assess your strengths.  But know this:  Just because you made the team last year does not guarantee you a spot this year.  Is that clear?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No hard feelings, Weasley, alright?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hard feelings?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'll be going out for Keeper as well.  Nothing personal.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Really?  Strapping guy like you, you've got a Beater's build, don't you think?  Keeper needs to be agile, quick --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I like my chances.  Say... think you could introduce me to your friend Granger?  Wouldn't mind getting on a first name basis, know what I mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All right.  Cormac.  Ron.  It's down to you two for Keeper.  We'll decide it with a shootout. Demelza, you'll bring the Quaffle up against Cormac.  Ginny, you'll take on Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hang on.  She's his sister.  How do I know she won't toss him a floater?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Piss off, Cormac.  How 'bout I toss you a floater?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Quiet!  I'm Captain.  We do it my way.  Now line up.  On three. One.  Two... Three!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: C'mon, Ron...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Isn't he brilliant?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Have to admit, thought I was going to miss that last one.  Hope Cormac's not taking it too hard.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Has a bit of a thing for you, Hermione.  Cormac.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He's vile.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ever heard of this spell?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No I have not. And if you had a shred of self-respect you would turn that book in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Not bloody likely.  He's top of the class.  Even better than you, Hermione.  Slughorn thinks he's a genius.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'd like to know just whose book that was.  Let's take a look, shall we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why not?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's... old.  The binding is fragile.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The binding is fragile?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who's the Half-Blood Prince?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's what it says.  Right here. 'This Book is the Property of the Half-Blood Prince.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: For weeks you carry around this book, practically sleep with it... and you have no desire to find out who The Half-Blood Prince is?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I didn't say I wasn't curious. And, by the way, I don't sleep with it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yeah. Right. Well, it's true.  I like a nice chat before I go to bed.  Now you're always reading that bloody book.  It's like being with Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, I was curious.  So I went to

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The library.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The library.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And... nothing.  There's no reference to the Half-Blood Prince anywhere.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good.  That settles it then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hey, you three!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What've you got there, Hagrid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Stinksap.  Burn the whiskers right off yer chin.  Trees 'ere are drippin' with it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Stinksap?  You're not sick, are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's not fer me.  It's fer Aragog. Yeh remember Aragog, don' yeh?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Spider?  About six feet tall?  Ten feet wide?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Tha's the one.  He's taken ill. I'm hopin' ter nurse 'im back. Keep yer fingers crossed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Barking.  Does he not remember that raving arachnid tried to eat us? What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The Aurors. I know they're here to protect us, but... somehow I don't feel any safer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Filius!  I was hoping to find you at the Three Broomsticks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Emergency choir practice, I'm afraid, Horace.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who's up for a Butterbeer?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  Over here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No, no.  Sit next to me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: O-kay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What'll we have?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Three Butterbeers.  Splash of ginger in mine, please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Aw, bloody hell...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh, honestly, Ronald.  They're just holding hands...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And snogging.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'd like to leave.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Leave?  You can't be serious.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That happens to be my sister.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So?  What if she looked over here and saw you snogging me?  Would you expect her to get up and leave?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry, m'boy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hello, sir.  Wonderful to see you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So what brings you here, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh, the Three Broomsticks and I go way back.  Longer than I'd care to admit.  In fact, I remember when it was simply One Broomstick!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oops!  All hands on deck, Granger!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Listen, m'boy.  In the old days, I used to throw together the occasional supper and invite a select student or two.  Would you be game?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'd consider it an honor, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You'd be welcome too, Granger.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Be delighted, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Brilliant.  Look for my owl. Good to see you, Wallenby.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What're you playing at?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore asked me to... get to know him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Get to know him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dunno.  But it must be important. Otherwise Dumbledore wouldn't ask.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Um... You've got a little...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Bit worried about her.  Did you hear that rubbish she was talking back in the pub?  Her and me snogging.  Ha.  As if...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Katie.  You don't know what it could be!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What's up?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I warned her!  I warned her not to touch it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry, she's swallowing her tongue --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'll get someone --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: There's no time!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Get back!  All o' yeh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now, now.  Now, now...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don' go touchin' tha' but by the wrappin's.  Unnerstan'?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're sure Katie did not have this in her possession when she entered the Three Broomsticks, Leanne?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's like I said.  She went to the loo and when she came back she had the package.  She said it was important she deliver it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Did she say to whom?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All right, Leanne.  You may go. Why is it always you three?  Hm? When something happens?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Believe me, Professor, I've been asking myself the same question for six years.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Severus. Is this it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What do you think?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think Miss Bell is lucky to be alive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: She was cursed, wasn't she?  I know Katie.  Off the Quidditch pitch she wouldn't hurt a fly.  If she was bringing that to someone, she wasn't doing it knowingly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes.  She was cursed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It was Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's a very serious accusation, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Indeed.  Your evidence?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I... just... know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You... just... know.  Once again you astonish with your gifts, Potter, gifts mere mortals could only dream of possessing.  How grand it must be to be the Chosen One.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I suggest you return to your dormitory.  All of you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What do you suppose Dean sees in her?  Ginny.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What does she see in him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dean?  He's brilliant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You called him a slick git not five hours ago.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, well, he was running his hands all over my sister, wasn't he?  Something snaps.  You've got to hate him.  You know, on principle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I suppose.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So what is it?  He sees in her?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't know.  She's smart. Funny.  Attractive...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Attractive?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You know.  She's... got nice skin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Skin?  You're saying Dean's dating my sister because of her skin?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, no.  I mean... I'm just saying it could be a contributing factor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hermione's got nice skin. Wouldn't you say?  As skin goes, I mean.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I've never really thought about it.  But I suppose, yeah.  Very nice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think I'll be going to sleep now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: To Hogwarts' best and brightest!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Here, here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Which one do I use for the soup?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So tell me, Cormac.  See much of your Uncle Tiberius these days?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.  In fact, I'm meant to go hunting with him and the Minister for Magic over holiday.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, be sure to give them both my best.  What about your uncle, Belby?  Working on anything new? For those of you who don't know, Marcus' uncle invented the Wolfsbane Potion.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dunno.  He and me dad don't get on. Probably because Dad thinks potions are rubbish.  Says the only potion worth having is a stiff one at the end of the --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And you, Miss Granger?  What is it your family does in the Muggle world?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: My parents are dentists.  They tend to people's teeth.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Fascinating.  And is that considered a dangerous profession?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  Though, a boy named Robbie Fenwick did bite my father once. Needed ten stitches.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Miss Weasley!  Come in, come in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, I'm not ordinarily late --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No matter.  You'll be just in time for dessert.  That is -- if Belby leaves you any.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Look at her eyes.  They've been fighting again.  Her and Dean.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Nothing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Thank you, one and all, for a most stimulating evening.  We'll have to do it again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh.  Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, sir, I was just admiring your hourglass.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah, yes.  A most intriguing object.  The sands run in accordance to the quality of the conversation.  When it is stimulating, the sands run slow. When it is not...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think I'll be going.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Nonsense.  You have nothing to fear, m'boy.  As for some of your classmates, well, let's just say, they're unlikely to make the shelf.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The shelf, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Anyone who aspires to be anyone hopes to end up here.  Then again... you are already someone aren't you, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't really know how to answer that, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Your mother was modest too.  Your father not so much.  As you can see, he did not make the shelf.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Did Voldemort ever make the shelf, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You knew him, didn't you, sir? Tom Riddle.  You were his teacher.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Riddle had many teachers while here at Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What was he like?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry, sir.  Forgive me.  He killed my parents, you see...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Of course.  It's only natural that you should want to know more.  I'm afraid I must disappoint you, Harry.  When I first met young Mr. Riddle, he was simply a quiet, albeit brilliant, boy committed to becoming a first-rate wizard.  Not unlike the others I've known.  In fact, not unlike... you.  If the monster existed, it was buried deep within.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good luck, eh, Ron?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Counting on you, Ron.  I've two Galleons on Gryffindor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So.  How was it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How was what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Your dinner party.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dead boring.  Though I think Harry enjoyed dessert.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ol' Sluggy's having a Christmas do, you know.  And we're meant to bring someone...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I expect you'll be going with McLaggen.  Isn't he a member of the Slug Club?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Actually, I was going to ask you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Really?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Really.  But seeing as you have such a distaste for the idea --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good luck today, Ron!  I know you'll be brilliant!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm resigning.  After today's match.  McLaggen can have my spot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Have it your way.  Juice?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sure...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hello, everyone.  You look dreadful, Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Is that why you just put something in his cup.  Is it a tonic?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't drink that, Ron!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You could be expelled for that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dunno what you're talking about.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: C'mon, Harry.  We've got a game to win.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What's gotten into him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ginny!  Let's go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Weasley!  Weasley!  Weasley!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ron seems to be enjoying himself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yep.  Apparently it's his lucky day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You shouldn't have done it, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.  I suppose I could've just used, I dunno... a Confundus charm?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That was different.  It was tryouts.  This was an actual match --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You didn't put it in? Ron only thought you did?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Charms spell.  Just practicing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah.  Well... they're really good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How does it feel, Harry?  When you see Dean with Ginny? I know, Harry.  You're my best friend.  I see how you look at her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oops.  I think this room's taken.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What's with the birds?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oppugno!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It feels like this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Look, I can't help it if she's got her knickers in a twist.  What Lav and I have -- well, let's just say there was no stopping it.  It's chemical.  Will it last?  Who knows?  Point is, I'm a free agent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He's at perfect liberty to kiss whomever he likes.  I really couldn't care less.  Was I under the impression that he and I would be attending Slughorn's Christmas party together?  Yes.  Of course, now, given the circumstances, I've had to make other arrangements.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Have you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes.  Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I just thought, you know, since neither one of us can take who we'd really like... maybe we'd go together.  As friends.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why didn't I think of that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So who are you taking?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Um... it's a surprise.  Besides, it's you we need to worry about. And you can't pick just anyone. See that girl over there.  That's Romilda Vane.  Rumor has it she's trying to slip you a love potion.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Really...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hey! She's only interested in you because she thinks you're the Chosen One.  You know that, right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But I am the Chosen One.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Okay.  Kidding.  I'll just ask someone I like.  Someone cool.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I've never been to this part of the castle.  At least not while awake.  I sleepwalk, you see. It's why I wear shoes to bed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Someone has taken a BITE out of it. Thank you, Adrian! One of mine.  Class of '78.  I had hoped for more out of him, but at least the pictures are in focus. Oh my!  Excuse me, Harry.  I must greet the new Minister of Magical Transportation.  Class of '67. Mingle, m'boy!  Mingle!  We're all friends here.  And we run the world.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Drink?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Neville...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I didn't make the cut for the Slug Club.  It's okay.  He's got Belby handing out towels in the loo.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Lovegood, did you say?  I once encountered a seriously unbalanced man by that name at a book signing.  Claimed to run a magazine...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What're you doing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And what's happened to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hm?  Oh, I've just escaped -- I mean, left Cormac.  Under the mistletoe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Cormac!  That's who you invited!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I thought it would annoy Ron most. But he's a menace.  He's got more tentacles than a Snarfalump plant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dragon tartar?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No thank you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Just as well.  They give one horribly bad breath.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: On second thought -- maybe it'll keep Cormac at bay.  Oh no, here he comes!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think she went to powder her nose.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Slippery little minx, your friend. Likes to work her mouth too, doesn't she?  Yak yak yak. What is this I'm eating, by the way?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dragon balls.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What's going on back here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You've just bought yourself a month's detention, McLaggen.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Not so quick, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think I should rejoin the party, sir.  My date...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: ... can surely survive your absence for another minute or two.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Besides, I only wish to convey a message.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: A message...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: From Professor Dumbledore.  He asked that I give you his best and that he hopes you enjoy your holiday.  You see, he's traveling and won't return until term resumes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Traveling?  Where?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Take your hands off me,  you filthy squib!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor Slughorn, sir!  I've just discovered this boy lurking in an upstairs corridor.  He claims to have been invited to your party.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Okay, okay, I was gate-crashing. Happy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'll escort him out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Certainly... Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Maybe I did hex that Bell girl. Maybe I didn't.  What's it to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I swore to protect you.  I made the Unbreakable Vow --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't need protection.  I was chosen for this!  Out of all others.  Me!  And I won't fail him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're afraid, Draco.  You attempt to conceal it, but it's obvious. Let me assist you --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No!  I was chosen.  This is my moment!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Unbreakable Vow.  You're sure that's what Snape said.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Positive.  Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's just, well, you can't break an Unbreakable Vow.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'd worked that much out for myself, funnily enough.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No, you don't understand -- Oh, bloody hell...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Lovely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All she wants to do is snog me. My lips are getting chapped. Look.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'll take your word for it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So what happens?  If you break an Unbreakable Vow?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You die.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Eat up, eat up, everyone!  There's more to come!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Draco's plotting something, I know it, something to do with Voldemort.  He's been given a task or a mission -- and Snape was offering to help.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort has chosen Draco Malfoy for a mission?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know it sounds mad --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Has it occurred to you, Harry, that Snape was simply pretending to offer Draco help so that he could find out what he's up to?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's not what it sounded like.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps Harry's right, Remus.  To make an Unbreakable Vow, after all --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It comes down to whether or not you trust Dumbledore's judgement. He trusts Snape.  Therefore, I do.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But Dumbledore can make mistakes. He's said it himself --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're blinded by hatred.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm not --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You are!  People are disappearing, Harry.  Daily.  We can only put our trust in a handful of people. If we start fighting amongst ourselves, we're doomed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Open up, you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't trust me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: 'Course 'tis.  Made them myself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You'll have to forgive Remus.  It takes its toll -- his condition.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Are you alright, Mr. Weasley?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: We're being followed, all of us. Molly doesn't leave the house most days.  It's not been easy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Did you get my owl?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, but I thought it best if I replied in person.  If Dumbledore's traveling, it's news to the Ministry.  But perhaps that's the way Dumbledore wants it.  As for Draco Malfoy -- I know a bit more.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I sent an agent to Borgin & Burkes.  From what you describe, I think what you and Ron saw at the end of the summer -- the object that Draco seemed so interested in -- was a Vanishing Cabinet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: A Vanishing Cabinet?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: They were all the rage when Voldemort first rose to power. You can imagine the appeal. Should the Death Eaters come calling, one needed only slip inside and disappear for an hour or two.  But they're tricky contraptions.  Require a tremendous amount of looking after.  Eventually they fell out of favor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What happened to it?  The one at Borgin & Burkes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Nothing.  It's still there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry.  You know, I went through all this before -- the last time around.  Times like these -- dark times -- do funny things to people.  It can bring them together and it can tear them apart.  Things... speed up.  It's what happens when you don't know if today will be your last.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It was delicious, Molly.  Really.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're sure you won't stay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No, we should go. The first night of the cycle is always the worst --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Remus...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Everyone gone to bed?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Soon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't sleep these days.  So I wash my hair.  Silly, right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Happy Christmas, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sweetheart...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: There's someone out there.  I can smell him.  There's more than one --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh my god...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry, no!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Remus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ginny, stay with your mother!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No, Harry!  It's a trap!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't you smell clean.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You have to realize who you are, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know who I am, Hermione, alright?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sorry. So tell me what Arthur said.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: If Dumbledore's traveling places, it's news to the Ministry.  But get this:  that night at Borgin & Burkes?  It seems Draco was looking at a Vanishing Cabinet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What would Draco want with a Vanishing Cabinet?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You tell me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He looks different, don't you think?  Draco.  Almost... ill.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who could tell the difference?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Lav, c'mon. Of course I'll wear it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's my Won-Won.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, I have to go vomit.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgeable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Intuition.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good gracious, look at the time. Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know a secret shortcut or two.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic, and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't know anything about such things and I wouldn't tell you if I did!  Now get out of here at once and don't ever let me catch you mentioning it again!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Confused?  I would be surprised if you weren't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't understand -- what happened?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This is perhaps the most important memory I've collected.  It's also a lie. This memory has been tampered with.  In this case by the person whose memory it is, our friend Professor Slughorn.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But why would he tamper with his own memory?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I suspect he is ashamed of it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why indeed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I asked you to get to know Professor Slughorn and you've done so.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now I want you to persuade him to divulge his true memory.  Any way you can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't know him that well, sir --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're the Chosen One, Harry.  And Horace is, at heart, a decent man. Provide the proper circumstances and he will confess his sins.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This memory is everything, Harry. Without it, we are blind. Without it, we leave the fate of our world to chance.  You have no choice. You must not fail.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now don't forget to look over the chapter on antidotes.  I'll be poisoning one of you next time we meet.  I'm joking!  Off you go! Don't forget your rattails, Miss Alys.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah! If it isn't the Prince of Potions himself!  To what do I owe the pleasure?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, sir, I wondered if I might ask you something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ask away, my dear boy, ask away!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, you see, the other day I was in the Restricted Section -- in the library -- and I stumbled upon something rather odd while reading.  Something about a bit of rare magic...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes?  And exactly what was this rare magic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm not sure... That is, I don't recall the name... exactly.  But it got me wondering... Are there some kinds of magic you're not allowed to teach?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm a Potions Professor, Harry. Perhaps your question would best be posed to Professor Snape.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, well, we don't exactly see eye-to-eye, sir.  What I mean to say is, he's not like you.  He might... misunderstand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: There can be no light without the dark.  And so it is with magic. Myself, I have always strived to live within the light.  I suggest you do the same.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Did you say the same to Tom Riddle, sir?  When he came asking questions.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore put you up to this. Didn't he?  Didn't he!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dead. Did you actually expect you could just walk up to Ol' Sluggy and ask him to reveal his deepest, darkest secret?  Honestly, Harry, sometimes I think the Daily Prophet should call you the Dim One.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Nice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're going to have to persuade him somehow.  And now, I'm afraid, you've made it a lot harder.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hermione.  I think Malfoy's leaving the castle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I've seen it.  Sometimes... sometimes he just disappears off the Map.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's... not possible.  No one can leave the castle these days. The Map is wrong.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The Map is never wrong.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's beautiful, isn't it?  The moon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Divine.  Had ourselves a little late-night snack, did we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It was on your bed.  The box. Thought I'd try one...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Or twenty.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I can't stop thinking about her, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Really?  Honestly, I reckoned she was starting to annoy you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: She could never annoy me.  I think... I think I love her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well... Brilliant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you think she knows I exist?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Bloody well hope so.  She's been snogging you for three months.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Snogging?  Who're you talking about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who're you talking about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Romilda, of course.  Romilda Vane.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Okay.  Very funny.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What the hell was that for?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's no joke!  I'm in love with her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Okay!  Fine!  You're in love with her!  Have you ever actually met her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  Can you introduce me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ron, these chocolates, they're -- C'mon.  I'm going to introduce you to Romilda Vane.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How do I look?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Devastatingly handsome.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Damn it all!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes???!!!! Oh.  Potter.  It's you.  I'm afraid I'm busy at the moment --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir.  I'm sorry.  I wouldn't bother you if it weren't absolutely --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Where's Romilda?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What's the matter with Wenby?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah.  Very well.  Bring him in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'd have thought you could whip up a remedy for this in no time, Harry -- an expert potioneer like you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I figured this called for a more practiced hand, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hello, darling.  Fancy a drink?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hm.  Perhaps you're right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry, sir.  About the other day.  Our... misunderstanding.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, well, water under the bridge as they say, correct?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I mean, I'm sure you're tired of it, after all these years.  The questions.  About... Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'll ask you not to use that name.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.  It's just, well, Dumbledore once said that fear of a name only increases fear of the thing itself.  It seemed sensible.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: With all due respect, Dumbledore sometimes forgets that most of us do not possess powers so great that we can risk offending the most dangerous Dark Lord who ever lived.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Alright, m'boy!  Bottoms up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What's this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: A tonic for the nerves.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What happened to me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Love potion.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And a bloody strong one at that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I feel really... bad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Pick-me-up's what you need, m'boy. Do us all good, I think.  I've got butterbeer, wine -- ah -- and a dazzling oak-matured mead.  I had other intentions for this but given the circumstances...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: There we are, Potter.  To life!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ron!  Ron!!!  Professor, help him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I d-don't understand --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor!  Do something!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He's choking!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Breathe!  C'mon, Ron, don't be a prat.  Breathe!  BREATHE!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: These girls are gonna kill me, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Quick thinking on your part, Harry.  Using a Bezoar.  You must be very proud of your student, eh, Horace?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hm?  Oh.  Yes... very proud.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think we all agree that Mr. Potter's actions were heroic.  The question is:  Why were they necessary.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why indeed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This appears to be a gift, Horace. You don't by chance remember who gave you this bottle, do you -- which by the way possesses remarkably subtle hints of licorice and cherry when not polluted with poison.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Actually I had intended to give it as a gift myself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: To whom might I ask?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You, Headmaster.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Where is he?  Where's my Won-Won! Has he been asking for me? What's she doing here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I might ask you the same.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I happen to be his girlfriend.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I happen to be his... friend.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't make me laugh.  You haven't spoken in weeks.  I suppose you want to make up with him now that he's suddenly all interesting.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He's been poisoned, you daft dimbo! And for the record, I've always found him interesting.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ha!  See? He senses my presence. I'm here, Won-Won. I'm here --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Er... My... Nee... Er!  My!  Nee!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah, to be young and feel love's keen sting.  Come, everyone, I think Mr. Weasley is well tended.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: 'Bout time, don't you think?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I've always cherished my students. They're my life...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh shut up.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ron.  Stop.  You're making it snow.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Huh?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Tell me again how I broke up with Lavender?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Um, well, she came to visit you in the hospital, you see, and you talked -- I don't believe it was a long conversation --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't get me wrong.  I'm bloody thrilled to be shot of her.  It's just she seems... a bit put out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Does, doesn't she?  And you say you don't remember a thing from that night?  Not one thing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well... there is... something. But no.  It can't be.  Besides, I was completely boggled, wasn't I?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Right.  Boggled...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's Katie.  That's Katie Bell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How are you, Katie?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Give me a moment, girls.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know you're going to ask, Harry. But I don't know who cursed me. I've tried to remember.  Honestly. But I just... can't...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Cruci--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sectumsempra!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't touch me!  Don't you dare touch me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You have to get rid of it.  Today.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Take my hand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The Room of Requirement...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Over the years, if someone had a secret, if they wanted to conceal something, this is where they came.  Some of these things are almost as old as the castle itself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who showed you this?  First.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Fred and George.  First year.  I hid Tom Riddle's diary here for a time.  Wish I'd left it...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What was that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: See, you never know what you'll find up here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All right.  Close your eyes.  That way you can't be tempted.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: There's something else.  Another secret of sorts.  One of mine...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That can stay hidden up here too, if you like.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: So.  Did you and Ginny do it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You know.  Hide the book.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh.  Yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Still no luck with Slughorn, I take it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Say that again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well?  How do you feel?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Excellent.  Really excellent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now remember.  Slughorn usually eats early, takes a short walk and then returns to his office.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Right.  I'm going down to Hagrid's.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What?  No, Harry -- you've got to go see Slughorn.  We have a plan --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  I've got a good feeling about going to Hagrid's.  I feel like it's the place to be tonight, know what I mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Trust me.  I know what I'm doing. Or at least Felix does.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Merlin's beard, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, sir.  I should've announced myself.  Cleared my throat. Coughed.  You probably feared I was Madam Sprout.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, yes, actually -- Why would you think that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Just the general behavior, sir. The sneaking around.  The jumping when you saw me.  By the way, those Tentacula leaves -- they're quite valuable, aren't they?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ten galleons a leaf to the right buyer -- not that I'm familiar with such back alley transactions. One hears rumors is all.  My own interests are purely academic, of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Personally, these plants have always kind of freaked me out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Exactly how did you get out of the castle, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Through the front doors, sir.  I'm off to Hagrid's, you see.  He's a very dear friend and I felt like paying him a visit.  So if you don't mind, I'll be going.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's nearly nightfall.  Surely you realize I can't allow you to roam the grounds all by yourself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, then by all means come along, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I must insist you accompany me back to the castle immediately!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That would be counterproductive, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And what makes you say that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No idea.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Merlin's beard...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Is that an actual Acromantula?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: A dead one, I think, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: 'Arry.  'Orace.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: My god, dear man.  How did you ever manage to kill it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Kill 'im! Me oldest friend, 'e was!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry, I... didn't realize.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ah, don' worry yerself.  Yer not alone.  Seriously misunderstood creatures -- spiders.  It's the eyes, I reckon.  Unnerve people.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Not to mention the pincers.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I reckon that too... How'd yeh get outta the castle anyways?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Through the front doors.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid.  I wouldn't want to be indelicate, but Acromantula venom is uncommonly rare and, well, if you wouldn't mind my extracting a vial or two -- purely for academic pursuits...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don' suppose it's doin' 'im any good, izzit?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: My thoughts exactly!  Always carry a few spare ampoules for just such occasions.  Old Potion Master's habit, you know...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Wish yeh coulda seen 'im in 'is prime.  Magnificent 'e was.  Jus' magnificent...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why don't I say a few words?  I trust he had family?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Farewell...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Aragog.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Farewell, Aragog, king of arachnids.  Though your body will decay, your spirit lingers on in the quiet, web-spun places of your Forest home.  May your many-eyed descendents ever flourish and your human friends find solace for the loss they have sustained.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Tha' was... tha' was... beautiful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And Odo the hero, they bore him back home...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: To the place he'd known as a lad, They laid him to rest with his hat inside out and his wand snapped in two, which was sad...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I had 'im from an egg, yeh know. Tiny little thing he was when he hatched.  No bigger'n a Pekinese.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sweet.  I once had a fish. Francis.  Lovely little thing. One day I came downstairs and he'd vanished.  Poof.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Tha's odd.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Isn't it?  That's life, I suppose. One goes along and then... poof.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's never unicorn hair, Hagrid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid looks up, reels a bit.  Nods.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But my dear chap, do you know how much that's worth?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No idea... no idea at all...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It was a student who gave me Francis.  One spring afternoon I discovered a bowl upon my desk with a few inches of clear water. There was a flower petal floating upon the surface.  As I watched, the petal sank, but just before it touched bottom... it transformed. Into a wee fish.  It was beautiful magic, wondrous to behold.  The petal had come from a lily.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Your mother.  The day I came downstairs, the day I found the bowl empty... was the day she...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know what you want.  But I can't give it to you.  It will ruin me...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you know why I survived?  The night I got this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Because of her.  Because she sacrificed herself.  Because she refused to step aside.  Because her love was more powerful than Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Please don't say his --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm not afraid of the name, Professor.  And I'm not afraid of him.  And you shouldn't be either. She didn't just die for me that night.  She died for you too.  She died for everyone who's ever woken in the middle of the night afraid a Death Eater waited on their doorstep.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor.  I'm going to tell you something, something others have only guessed at.  It's true.  I am the Chosen One.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Only I can kill him.  But in order to do so, I need to know what Tom Riddle asked you that night in your office all those years ago. And I need to know what you told him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Be brave, Professor.  Be brave like my mother.  Otherwise you disgrace her.  Otherwise she died for nothing.  Otherwise, the bowl remains empty forever.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't think too badly of me once you've seen it.  You don't know what he was like... even then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How is he?  Horace?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
