Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: This is you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Finite Incantatem, okay.  And if that doesn't work...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't like him being on his own down there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron's been coming here since he was two years old.  It's us you should be worrying about.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You really have horrible teeth, you know that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Oh, yes... of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sh...careful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Runcorn.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Accio locket.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All right, all right.  Let's calm down, shall we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It probably just snuck up here from Experimental Charms.  I think none of us will soon forget last month's Poisonous Duck...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: R-Runcorn.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: M-morning.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron, it's me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry!  Blimey, I forgot what you looked like.  Where's Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Reg.  Isn't Mary in for questioning today?  Try to have faith.  If there's anything Molly and I can do for you --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Arthur!  You know you're being tracked, don't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Is that a threat, Runcorn?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, Arthur.  It's a fact.  They're watching you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'll tell you later.  Let's find Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Bloody cold down here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm half-blood, I tell you!  My father was a wizard!  Look him up! William Alderton!  He worked here for thirty years...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's here...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Reg...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mary Elizabeth Cattermole?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mother to Maisie, Ellie and Alfred?  Wife to Reginald?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: A wand was taken from you upon your arrival at the Ministry today, Mrs. Cattermole.  Is this that wand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But I didn't take it.  I got it in Diagon Alley, at Ollivander's, when I was eleven.  It chose me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, no, I don't think so, Mrs. Cattermole.  Wands only choose witches.  And you are not a witch.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But I am!  Tell them, Reg!  Tell them what I am!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What the devil are you doing, Albert?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're lying.  And one mustn't tell lies, Dolores... Stupefy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Expecto PATRONUM!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Relashio!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You?  It's you! Reg, it's Harry Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'Tis, isn't it?  This'll be one to tell the kids.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry... they've seen you.  We've got to get out of here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mary.  Go home.  Get the kids. I'll... I'll meet you there.  We have to get out the country, understand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mary!  Do as I say!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry.  It's just --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Long story.  Nice meeting you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Piss off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Seal the exits!  Now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, quickly, in my bag, there's a small bottle labeled 'Essence of Dittany.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Quickly!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Accio Dittany.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Unstopper it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione.  His arm --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Just do it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What happened?  I thought we were going back to Grimmauld Place.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We were.  We were there.  But Yaxley had hold of me.  I knew we couldn't stay once he'd seen, so when he let go I brought us here. Ron got Splinched.  I'm... sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't be stupid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's all I feel safe doing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Salvio Hexia... Protego Totalum...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What're you doing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Protective enchantments.  I don't fancy another visit like we had on Shaftesbury Avenue, do you? Especially with Ron like this. You can get going on the tent...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Tent?  Where am I supposed to find --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Repello Muggletum... Muffliato...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How're the mushrooms?  Seem to be the only edible things growing round here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: They're great.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Make sure to leave some for Ron.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No problem.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How bad is he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He'll be alright in a few days. Hopefully.  If we could take him to Hogwarts, to Madam Pomfrey --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: So where do we go next?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore had a theory.  He felt that the Horcruxes would not be made out of random objects.  And he felt they wouldn't be hidden randomly either.  We know of three so far.  The ring, which according to Dumbledore belonged to Tom Riddle's grandfather.  The diary, which belonged to Tom himself. And this, which -- again, according to Dumbledore -- belonged to his mother.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It scares me a bit, that, thinking it's a piece of Vol--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, don't!  Don't say it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's taboo -- You-Know-Who's name. That's how they track people now. It's how they found us in the cafe that night.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How d'you know?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I overheard a bloke from the Enforcement office talking about it at the Ministry.  Blimey, what's that smell?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dinner?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Not bloody likely.  Smells like something Ginny would cook.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Tea?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Is that it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I know.  I felt it too. It's... it's like it's ticking or something, like it has a tiny metal heart, like it's --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: ... alive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I hate it.  It's like he's here with us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That's why we're going to kill it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dissendium!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Incendio!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Expulso!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Confringo!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's angry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What're you doing?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We have to keep it safe until we can figure out how to destroy it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I can put it in my bag --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Seems strange, mate.  Dumbledore sends you off to find a load of Horcruxes, but doesn't bother to tell you how to destroy them. Doesn't that bother you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You wouldn't be lying to me, would you, Gregorovitch?  Because, I must tell you... that will only make it worse for you...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who was he?  The thief?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Just a boy!  Not of the village. It was he who took it.  I never saw it again.  I swear on my life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I believe you...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I thought it had stopped.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You can't let him in, Harry. Dumbledore himself said it.  You have to close your mind.  It's too dangerous --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's not a candle I can blow out, Hermione.  It always burns, even if it's just a flicker.  Can you understand that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Tell me. What you saw.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He's found him.  Vol--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You-Know-Who.  He's found Gregorovitch --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The wandmaker?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.  How'd you know?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Viktor got his wand from Gregorovitch.  Most Durmstrang students did at one time.  What's he got to do with You-Know-Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You-Know-Who wants something Gregorovitch once had -- dunno what.  But he's desperate to have it.  It's as if his life depends on it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't -- It... comforts him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well it sets my teeth on edge. What's he expecting to hear?  Good news?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I think he just hopes he doesn't hear bad news.  It gets him through the day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And what gets you through the day?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We've all made sacrifices, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How long before he can travel?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't know.  It takes time.  I'm doing all I can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're not doing enough.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Take it off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Take it off.  Now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Better?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Loads.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's cold.  Even though it's been lying against your skin for days.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We'll take turns.  Okay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What's that?  That... smell?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Snatchers.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Good to know your enchantments work.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He could smell it.  My perfume.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We have to leave.  We're not safe here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I told you.  Ron's not strong enough to Apparate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Then we'll go by foot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm hungry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We're all hungry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Leave it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mum can make food appear out of thin air.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No one can conjure food out of thin air.  Food is the first of the five Principal Exceptions to Gamp's Law.  The other four are --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Oh, speak English, can't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I said leave it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It'll be dark soon.  We need to find a place to sleep.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Good plan.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.  Brilliant.  Only, correct me if I'm wrong... wasn't that yesterday's plan?  And the day before that?  And the day before that?  Walk.  Sleep.  Walk. Sleep.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My turn.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He doesn't know what he's doing, does he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: None of us do.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wizards were here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't like this place.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I want to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'll tell you in a minute.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Maybe you could tell me now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Alright.  The Sword of Gryffindor? It's Goblin made.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Brilliant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You don't understand.  Dirt and rust have no effect on the blade. It only takes in that which makes it stronger.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: O-kay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry.  You already destroyed one Horcrux, right?  Tom Riddle's diary -- in the Chamber of Secrets.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: With a basilisk fang.  If you tell me you've got one of those in that bloody beaded bag of yours --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't you see!  In the Chamber of Secrets, you stabbed the basilisk with the Sword of Gryffindor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Its blade is impregnated with basilisk venom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It only takes in that which makes it stronger...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Exactly!  Which means...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: ... it can destroy Horcruxes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Which is why Dumbledore left it to you in his will.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're brilliant, Hermione. Truly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Actually, I'm highly logical, which allows me to look past the extraneous detail and perceive clearly that which others overlook.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: There's only one problem...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The sword was stolen.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, I'm still here.  But you two carry on.  Don't let me spoil your fun.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What's the problem?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Problem?  There's no problem.  Not according to you, anyway.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Look, don't be shy.  If you've got something to say, spit it out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All right, I'll spit it out. Don't expect me to skip up and down because now there's some other damn thing we've got to find.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I thought you knew what you signed up for.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, I thought I did too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't understand.  What part of this isn't living up to your expectations?  Did you think we'd be staying in five-star hotels? Finding a Horcrux every other day? Did you think you'd be back to Mummy by Christmas?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, I just reckoned after all this time, we'd have actually achieved something.  I reckoned you knew what you were doing.  I reckoned Dumbledore had told you something worthwhile! I reckoned you had a plan!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I've told you everything Dumbledore told me! And in case you haven't noticed, we've found a Horcrux!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, and we're about as near getting rid of it as we are to finding the rest of them, aren't we!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Take it off, Ron.  Please take it off.  You wouldn't be talking like this if you hadn't been wearing it all day --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, he would.  D'you think I haven't noticed the two of you whispering behind my back?  D'you think I haven't guessed what you were thinking?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, we weren't --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't lie!  You said it, too, you said you were disappointed --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I didn't!  Not like that!  Harry -- I didn't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Do you know why I listen to that radio, every night?  Do you!  To make sure I don't hear Ginny's name or Fred or George or Mum or --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You think I don't listen!  You think I don't know what it's like --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stop!  Stop!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Go then.  But leave that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Are you staying?  Or coming?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Fine.  I get it.  I saw you two the other night.  Yeah, that's right.  Didn't know I knew, did you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What?  Ron, no -- please --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He's gone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Salvio Hexia... Protego Totalum...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's a Muggle station.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You were right.  It's like you said.  Snitches have flesh memories.  But I didn't catch my first Snitch with my hand.  I almost swallowed it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'I open at the close?'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What do you reckon it means?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't know.  But look, I've found something as well...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I thought it was a picture of an eye, but now I don't think it is. It isn't a rune and it's not in Spellman's Syllabary either.  And it's been inked in -- somebody drew it -- it isn't part of the book.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Luna's dad was wearing that, at Ron- At Bill and Fleur's wedding.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What d'you mean -- wearing it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Around his neck.  Like an amulet. I didn't think much of it at the time.  You know Luna -- she's always got some mad thing or the other she's carrying around.  I just figured it ran in the family.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Why would someone have drawn it in a children's book?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, I've been thinking.  I -- I want to go to Godric's Hollow. It's where I was born, it's where my parents died --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And it's exactly where You-Know- Who will expect you to go. Because it means something to you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But it means something to him too, Hermione.  You-Know-Who nearly died there.  Wouldn't that be just the kind of place he'd hide a Horcrux?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's dangerous, Harry.  But I have to admit, recently even I've been thinking we might have to go.  I think it's possible something else is hidden there. The sword.  If Dumbledore didn't want it falling into the Ministry's hands, but wanted you to find it, what better place to hide it than the birthplace of the founder of Gryffindor himself?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Godric's Hollow is the birthplace of Godric Gryffindor -- I mean, 'course it is.  Obvious, isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, did you ever even open A History of Magic?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Tossed it at Neville once when he was snoring -- might've popped open.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't ever let me give you a haircut again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I still think we should've used Polyjuice Potion.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No.  This is where I was born. I'm not returning as someone else.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I think it's Christmas Eve! Listen...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Do you think they'd be in there? My mum and dad?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah. I think they would.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Is it -- ?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No.  But look.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Did you know he had a sister?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Lumos.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ignotus... Hey, Har --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Happy Christmas, Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Happy Christmas, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Someone's watching us.  By the gate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: C'mon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't think this is a good idea.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We look like ordinary Muggles.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Muggles who've just been laying flowers on your parents' grave.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Relax.  This is right.  I know it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Omigod.  Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: This is where they died, Hermione. This is where he murdered them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're Bathilda, aren't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I'm not sure about this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, she knew Dumbledore. She might have the sword. Besides, she's barely knee-high to a house-elf.  I think we can overpower her if it turns ugly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: There's something odd about her. And what's that smell?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: She's gaga, remember?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Here.  Let me do that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You have a lovely house, Miss Bagshot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Miss Bagshot?  Who is this man?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: His name.  Can you tell me his name?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: This is him, Hermione.  The one I saw in Gregorovitch's wandshop. The thief.  Miss Bagshot, who is he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: She wants us to go upstairs.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All right...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: She wants me to go.  Alone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's all right.  You stay here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Lumos.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You are Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I have something for you...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Confringo!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry... Harry, can you hear me...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Good.  That's good...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We got away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Are you alright?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm fine.  But you've been sick. Rest... Rest a bit more...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You've outdone yourself this time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Forest of Dean.  I came here once with my mum and dad, years ago.  It's just how I remember it. The trees.  The river.  It's like nothing's changed.  Not true, of course.  Everything's changed.  If I brought my parents here, they wouldn't recognize any of it.  Not the trees.  Not the river.  Not... me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Where are they?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wendell and Monica Wilkens now reside happily in Sydney, Australia.  They have two dogs, run a small sweet shop, but floss daily.  No children.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Maybe we should just stay here, Harry.  Grow old.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You wanted to know who the boy in the photograph was.  Well, I know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It was in Bathilda's sitting room. Rita Skeeter had sent it to her. Harry, it doesn't make for very nice reading --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who is he, Hermione?  The thief? Did Dumbledore know him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: For a time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Tell me, Hermione.  Who is he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Gellert Grindelwald.  He's not very well known in Britain, but there was a time, before You-Know- Who...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, I don't need to have read A History of Magic to know who Gellert Grindelwald is.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: When Grindelwald was seventeen, he was expelled from Durmstrang. He'd started doing some twisted things at school -- experiments. A few teachers had always protected him, but they couldn't anymore.  After he left, he traveled for awhile, then ended up in Godric's Hollow where his great aunt lived, Bathilda Bagshot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Get to the hard part, Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: She introduced him to Dumbledore. It made sense.  Dumbledore's mother had just died, Grindelwald was troubled and they were both brilliant -- they'd never really had anyone they could talk to on the same level.  They did a lot of talking that summer.  But they always returned to one particular subject.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wizard rule over Muggles.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And Dumbledore believed in it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'For the Greater Good.'  What does that mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It was something Dumbledore came up with.  He believed wizards were superior and should rule over Muggles, but gently, for their own good.  Grindelwald took a more violent position.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It was a different time, Harry. It was one summer.  Dumbledore was young --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We're young, Hermione.  And here we are, risking our lives to fight against the very thing Dumbledore supported.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He changed, Harry.  Years later, it was Dumbledore who put Grindelwald in prison.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Where's my wand?  I'll take the watch.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione.  Where's my wand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's my fault.  As we were leaving Godric's Hollow, I cast a curse and it rebounded... I'm sorry, Harry, I tried to mend it but wands are different --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's done.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Maybe we can --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's done.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Leave me yours.  You get back in the warm.  And give me that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He loved you, Harry.  I know he loved you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Lumos! Accio Sword.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Diffindo.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Are -- you -- mental?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It was you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, yeah.  Bit obvious, I'd think.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And the doe.  That was you as well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No.  I reckoned it was you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My Patronus is a stag.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Right.  Antlers.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You didn't see anyone else?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, I... I did think maybe I saw something -- when I was running -- over there --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Anything?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But I reckon whoever cast the doe, put the sword in that pool hoping we'd find it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And we did, didn't we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: See that?  It knows.  It's afraid. Do it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What?  No.  Harry.  That thing's bad for me.  I can't handle it. I'm not making excuses for how I acted, but that thing affects me more than it affects you and Hermione.  It made me think stuff -- stuff I was thinking anyway, but it made everything worse.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All the more reason.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No.  I can't --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Then why are you here?  Why did you come back?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'll have to speak to it in order for it to open.  When it does, don't hesitate.  I don't know what's in here, but it'll put up a fight.  The bit of Riddle that was in his diary tried to kill me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: On three.  One.  Two.  Three. Take me inside...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stab it, Ron.  Now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I have seen your heart and it is mine...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't listen to it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron.  Don't listen to it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron.  Stab it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We were better without you, happier without you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who could look at you beside Harry Potter?  What are you, compared with the Chosen One...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron.  It lies!  Stab it!  STAB IT!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Your mother confessed that she would have preferred me as a son...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who wouldn't prefer him, what woman would take you, you are nothing, nothing, nothing to him...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Do it, Ron!  Kill it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: After you left, she cried for a week.  She's like my sister.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry.  I'm sorry I left.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You've sort of made up for it tonight.  Getting the sword. Finishing off the Horcrux.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Saving your life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And just think of it.  Only three to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Everything all right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Fine.  Actually... more than fine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wo -- hey -- ouch!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You -- complete -- arse -- Ronald -- Weasley!  You crawl back here after all these weeks and say, 'Hey?' Where's my wand?  Harry, where's my wand!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Um... I don't know?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter, you give me my wand!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How come he's got your wand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Never mind why he's got my wand --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What is that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You destroyed it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's a long story.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't think this changes anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, of course not.  I only destroyed a bloody freaking Horcrux!  Why would that change anything!  Do you know what it was like for me to hear those words coming from you!  To see you doing those things --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: See me doing what things?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What happened out there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's a long story.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Look, I wanted to come back the minute I'd left.  I just... didn't know how to find you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Exactly how did you find us?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: With this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It doesn't just turn off lights. I don't know exactly how it works, but Christmas morning I -- I was sleeping -- in this little pub-- I'd given some Snatchers the slip the night before, me being a blood- traitor and all -- anyway, I was sleeping when I heard it...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: A voice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Your voice, Hermione.  Coming out of this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And what may I ask did I say?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My name.  Just my name.  Like a whisper.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: So I took this and I clicked it and this tiny ball of light appeared.  And I knew.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Knew what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Just knew.  On account of Hermione's voice.  And sure enough, it floated toward me, the ball of light, right to my chest and then -- went straight through -- right here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I could feel it inside me.  It was warm, like the first sip of a good cup of tea.  And I knew it would take me where I needed to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: So I Disapparated and came out on this hillside.  It was dark.  I didn't have any idea where I was. I just had to hope one of you would show yourselves in the end. And you did.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I've always liked it.  These flames Hermione makes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How long you reckon she'll stay mad at me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Keep talking 'bout that little ball of light touching your heart -- she'll come round.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It was true.  Every word.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell.  I just realized. You need a wand, right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, I've got one.  Here.  It's Blackthorn, ten inches, nothing special, but I reckon it'll do.  I took it off a Snatcher a few weeks back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't tell Hermione, but they're a bit dim, Snatchers.  This one was definitely part Troll.  The smell off him...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Engorgio.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wo.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Reducio!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What's going on in there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Nothing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Nothing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Maybe a bit more practice, eh?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We need to talk.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I want to go and see Xenophilius Lovegood.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sorry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: See this?  It's a letter Dumbledore wrote to Grindelwald. Look at the signature.  It's the mark again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It keeps cropping up.  Here.  In Beedle the Bard.  In the graveyard in Godric's Hollow -- what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Jesus.  It was there too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Where?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Outside Gregorovitch's wand shop. on the alley wall...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But what does it mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you don't have a clue where the next Horcrux is.  And neither do I.  But this, this means something.  I'm sure of it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I think Hermione's right.  I think we ought to go and see Lovegood. What say we vote on it?  Those in favor...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, Harry.  Looks like it's Hermione and me this time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Not still mad at him, are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm always mad at him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Luna?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Luna.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Luna.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Keep off the dirigible plums.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What is it? Who are you? What do you want --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Mr. Lovegood.  I'm Harry Potter.  We met a few months back?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Would it be okay if we came in? It won't take long, sir.  I promise.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: So.  What brings you here, Mr. Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, sir, we need some help.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ah.  Help.  I see.  Yes, well, the thing is, helping Harry Potter, rather dangerous these days...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Aren't you the one who keeps telling everyone it's their first duty to help Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I have expressed that view, yes. In the past.  Would you excuse me one moment.  I shall return shortly and, um, try to help you...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What's going on here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He's mental.  Let's face it. Luna's always good value, but she's nutty as squirrel poo.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Do you see that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, yeah, of course.  It's massive, isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No!  Don't go near it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's an Erumpent horn.  It's a Class B Tradeable Material.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, all right...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: May I offer you all an infusion of Gurdyroots? We make it ourselves.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Where is Luna, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Luna?  Oh, um, she'll be along. Now how can I help you, Mr. Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, sir, it's about something you were wearing around your neck at the wedding.  A symbol...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You mean this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes!  Exactly.  What we wondered, sir, is, well, what is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What is it?  Well, it's the sign of the Deathly Hallows, of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Deathly Hallows.  I assume you're all familiar with 'The Tale of the Three Brothers?'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's in here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, there's no real reason to go on unless one is familiar with the tale.  Why don't you read it aloud, Miss...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Granger.  Well... all right. There were once three brothers who were traveling along a lonely, winding road at twilight --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Midnight.  Mum always said midnight. But twilight's fine.  Better actually.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: In time, the brothers reached a river too treacherous to pass...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, there you are.  Those are the Deathly Hallows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sorry... I still don't really understand...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Elder Wand...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Resurrection Stone...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: ... then encloses both in a TRIANGLE. The Cloak of Invisibility. Together... they make the Deathly Hallows.  Together... they make one master of Death.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Lovegood, does the Peverell family have anything to do with the Deathly Hallows?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ignotus and his brothers Cadmus and Antioch are thought to be the original owners of the Hallows and therefore the inspiration for the story.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ah, but your tea's grown cold. Excuse me, I'll be right back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Let's get out of here once he's back.  I'm not touching this stuff, hot or cold.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Which one would you choose if you could?  Of the Deathly Hallows?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's obvious, isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Cloak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Stone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're supposed to say the Cloak, but who wants to spend all day being invisible.  Dead boring if you ask me.  But an unbeatable wand!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Its owner grew drunk with power and was murdered.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, but imagine what a short wicked life you'd lead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Why the Stone, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, you could bring people back, couldn't you?  Mad-Eye. Dumbledore.  Sirius.  Anybody.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But according to the story they don't want to come back.  It's all rubbish anyway.  There's no such thing as the Deathly Hallows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But I have one.  The Invisibility Cloak my father left me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: There have always been Cloaks --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Not like Harry's.  I've seen a fair few.  Dad used to bring home the ones the Ministry confiscated from petty thieves and the like. They always got holes or tears. Harry's is different.  It's perfect.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And I think I've actually held the Resurrection Stone in my hands, that night in Dumbledore's office when he showed me the ring he'd destroyed, the Horcrux.  It had a symbol on it.  Now I think it was the mark of the Hallows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Lovegood.  Thank you, sir --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You forgot the water.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The water?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: For the tea.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Did, didn't I?  How silly of me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No matter, sir.  We really ought to be go--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, you mustn't --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're my only hope.  They were angry, you see, about what I'd been writing, so they took her. They took my Luna... But it's really you they want...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who took her, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Him.  Surely you call him You-Know- Who.  But his real name of course is... Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Nooooooooo!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stop!  I've got him --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron!  Harry!  Take my hand!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That treacherous old bleeder!  Is there no one we can trust!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: They've kidnapped Luna because he supported me.  He was just desperate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'll do the enchantments.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hello, beautiful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ah, Tom, I thought you would come one day.  But surely you must know I no longer have what you seek...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: If not you, then who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're so innocent, Tom.  Like a schoolboy.  There's so much you don't understand...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Tell me, Grindelwald.  Tell me where to find it!  Tell me who possesses it!  The name, Grindelwald!  The name!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Can't you guess, Tom?  It lies with him, of course.  Buried within the earth.  It is he who possesses it, even in death.  Your old friend and mine... Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: They exist.  The Hallows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But he only wants the one, the last one.  That's what he's been looking for.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What're you saying?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He knows where it is, You-Know- Who.  He'll have it by the end of the night.  He's found the Elder Wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't touch her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stop it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Your boyfriend'll get worse than that if he doesn't behave, lovely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What happened to you, ugly?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What's your name?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dudely.  Vernon Dudley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Check the list.  And you, ginger?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stan Shunpike.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Like 'ell you are.  We know skinny Stan.  Try again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Weasley... Barney Weasley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Weasley, eh?  Wouldn't be related to that blood traitor Arthur Weasley, would you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Piss off!  Arthur Weasley's ten times the wizard you are!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Worth ten times you if I can find him.  Wasn't you that tipped him off, was it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How 'bout you, lovely?  What do they call you...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Penelope Clearwater.  Half-blood.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You smell like vanilla, Penelope. I think you're going to be my favorite.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: There's no Vernon Dudley on 'ere.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hear that, ugly?  The list says you're lying.  How come you don't want us to know who you are?  Hm?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The list is wrong.  I told you who I am --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Change of plans, boys.  We won't be taking this lot to the Ministry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What did you put on me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: A Stinging Jinx.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How long will it last?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Not long.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Show me. Get Draco. Well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I can't be sure.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Draco. Look closely, son. If we are the ones to hand Potter over to the Dark Lord... ...everything would be forgiven. All would be as it was, you understand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Now, we won't be forgetting who actually caught him, I hope, Mr. Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You dare to talk to me like that in my own house?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Lucius. Don't be shy, sweetie. Come over. Now, if this isn't who we think it is, Draco, and we call him, he'll kill us all. We need to be absolutely sure.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What's wrong with his face?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes, what is wrong with his face?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: He came to us like that. Something he picked up in the forest, I reckon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Or ran into a Stinging Jinx. Was it you, dearie? Give me her wand. We'll see what her last spell was. Ah. Got you. What is that? Where'd you get that from?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It was in her bag when we searched her. Reckon it's mine now. Are you mad? Go! Get out!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Cissy, put the boys in the cellar. I want to have a little conversation with this one, girl-to-girl.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What are we gonna do? We can't leave Hermione alone with her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron? Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Luna?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That sword is meant to be in my vault at Gringotts. How did you get it? What else did you and your friends take from my vault?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I didn't take anything. Please. I didn't take anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't believe it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We have to do something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: There's no way out of here. We've tried everything. It's enchanted.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Please! please!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Shut up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're bleeding, Harry. That's a curious thing to keep in your sock.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Help us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Let her go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Shut up. Get back. You, goblin, come with me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Aah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dobby? What are you doing here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dobby has come to rescue Harry Potter, of course. Dobby will always be there for Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You can Apparate in and out of this room? Could you take us with you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Of course, sir. I'm an elf.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Works for me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dobby, I want you to take Luna and Mr. Ollivander--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Shell Cottage on the outskirts of Tinworth. Trust me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Whenever you're ready, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sir? I like her very much. Meet me at the top of the stairs in 10 seconds.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ow.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who gets his wand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm only going to ask you once more, goblin. Think very, very carefully before you answer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You don't know? Why weren't you doing your job? Who got into my vault? Who stole it? Who stole it? Well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: When I was last in your vault, the sword was there. Oh, well then, perhaps it just walked out on its own then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: There is no place safer than Gringotts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Liar! Consider yourself lucky, goblin. The same won't be said for this one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Like hell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Expellliarmus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stupefy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stop! Drop your wands. I said, drop them! Pick them up, Draco, now. Well, well, well, look what we have here. It's Harry Potter. He's all bright and shiny and new again, just in time for the Dark Lord. Call him. Call him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stupefy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Stupid elf. You could've killed me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dobby never meant to kill. Dobby only meant to maim or seriously injure.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How dare you take a witch's wand? How dare you defy your masters?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dobby has no master. Dobby is a free elf. And Dobby has come to save Harry Potter and his friends.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione. You're all right. We're safe. We're all safe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dobby. Dobby. No, just-- Hold on. Hold on. Look, just hold on, okay? We'll fix you. Hermione will have something. In your bag. Hermione? Hermione? What is it? Help me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Such a beautiful place... ...to be with friends. Dobby is happy to be with his friend... ...Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We should close his eyes. Don't you think? There. Now he could be sleeping.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I want to bury him. Properly. Without magic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's beautiful here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It was our Aunt's. We used to come here as kids. The Order uses it now as a safe house -- what's left of us, at least.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Muggles think these keep evil away. But they're wrong...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I need to talk to the goblin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Alive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You probably don't remember --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And brought me here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You are a very unusual wizard.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Why did you leave Gringotts?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Soon the Death Eaters will control it. That was unacceptable to me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Then you're on our side.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: This is a wizard's war. I take no side.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It is impossible.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Alone, yes. With you, no.
