Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How did you come by this sword?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's complicated. Why did Bellatrix Lestrange think it should be in her vault at Gringotts?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's complicated.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The sword presented itself to us in a moment of need. We didn't steal it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: There is a sword in Madam Lestrange's vault identical to this one, but it is a fake. It was placed there this past summer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And she never suspected?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The replica is very convincing. Only a goblin would recognize that this is the true Sword of Gryffindor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Who put it there? The fake.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It was not my place to ask, nor did I desire to. There are more than a few curious things in the vaults at Gringotts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And in Madam Lestrange's vault as well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I have no interest in gold.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Then what? The goblin twists the curl at his chin... then his eyes

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That is my price.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I have your word, Harry Potter, that you will give me the Sword of Gryffindor if I help you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Harry, are you thinking there's a Horcrux in Bellatrix's vault?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: She was terrified when she thought we'd been in there. She kept asking you what else we'd taken. I'd bet anything there's a Horcrux there. If we find it, we can kill it. And if we kill it, we're one step closer to killing him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And if we find one? How're we supposed to destroy it if we've given Griphook the sword?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I'm still working on that part.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He's too weak.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Forgive me if I don't get up.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Ollivander, I need to ask you a few questions.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Anything, m'boy, anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Can you identify these, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Walnut and dragon heartstring. Twelve and three quarter inches. Unyielding. This belongs to Bellatrix Lestrange.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hawthorn. Unicorn hair. Ten inches. Reasonably pliant. This was the wand of Draco Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Was? Isn't it still?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps not -- if you won it from him. I sense its allegiance has changed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. That much has always been clear to those of us who have studied wandlore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What do you know about the Deathly Hallows, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: There are rumored to be three: The Elder Wand, the Resurrection Stone and the Invisibility Cloak. It is said that to possess them all is to make oneself the Master of Death. But few truly believe such objects exist --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: But you, sir? Do you believe they exist?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You're lying. You know one exists and you told him about it. You told him about the Elder Wand and where to go looking for it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He tortured me! Besides, I conveyed only rumors. There's no guarantee he will find it --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He has found it, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's all, sir. We'll leave you to get some rest now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He's after you, Mr. Potter. If it's true, what you say, that he has the Elder Wand, I'm afraid you really don't stand a chance.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Then I guess I'll just have to kill him before he finds me, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You're sure it's hers?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Positive. Harry turns to the two wands on the table -- the ones he showed Ollivander -- and extends the longest to Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I reckon you should take this then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You heard Ollivander. It's Harry's now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: But I hate that thing -- that's the wand that killed Sirius! How can I hold it and not feel...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: If I can hold it, you can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How will we know what it is when we get in there? After all, a Horcrux can be anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I'll know. I can't explain. It's like...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's a bit scary.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It is, Harry. Did Dumbledore ever say anything to you, something that might explain why --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No. I just know. When one's near.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: This is the closest I could find to what you described, Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's perfect. Thank you, Fleur.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You're leaving, aren't you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: In the morning.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And Griphook?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He'll be leaving too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Listen, I don't know what you're up to, but I know goblins. If you've struck any kind of bargain with Griphook, you must be exceptionally careful to live up to it. If you don't... he won't be forgiving.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The sky has lost a star.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: My father used to say that when a child died. She looks up, smiles.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Yeah. Funny. Listen, Luna, about your father, I don't want you to think I --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I know you understand why my father did what he did, Harry. That's why we don't need to talk about it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hogwarts?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's not the place you left, you

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Neither am I.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Always good value. I'll miss her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What d'you think?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Wouldn't know you if I didn't know you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You want to tell me what that is?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Sirius gave it to me. He had a matching piece. He said if I ever needed him, all I had to do was look into it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You mean he could see you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Something like that. I don't know. He died before I ever got to use it. The thing is...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You'll think I'm mental, but more than once, when I've looked into it -- I think I've seen Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell... that's a sight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Well, how do I look?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hideous.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Oh dear, I missed a spot, didn't I? Hold still...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Couldn't do anything about that bit in the back that's always flipping up, could you? Dead annoying --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Never mind. I'm good.  That is you in there, isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You can give that to Hermione to hold, all right, Griphook?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Madam Lestrange.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Good morning? Good morning? You're Bellatrix Lestrange, not some dewy-eyed schoolgirl!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hey. Easy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: She gives us away and we might as well use that sword to slit our own throats. Understand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He's right. I was being stupid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: C'mon. Let's do it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Identification.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I wish to enter my vault.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I see. Very well. Excuse me, won't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I don't like to be kept waiting.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Next.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He's with me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: They know!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What do you mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: They know she's an imposter! They've been warned!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Madam Lestrange. Would you mind presenting your wand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And why should I do that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Harry, what do we do? Harry...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's the bank's policy. I'm sure you understand, given the current climate --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No, I most certainly do not understand --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid I must insist.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Imperio.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Very well, Madam Lestrange. If you will follow me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: But... Bogrod, there have been special instructions regarding the Lestrange vault.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I'm fully aware of that. I'm also aware the Lestranges are one of our oldest and most respected families.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir, but our instructions are very specific --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Let me be specific with you, Ricbert. I've run this bank for forty-five years, long before anyone had even heard of a Death Eater. The day may come that they feel they can run this place better than me, but that day has not yet arrived. Am I understood!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Madam, if you will, I will escort you myself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How long before they come after us?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What's that? Up ahead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I should have known --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What is that, Griphook?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Griphook! What is that!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Well done. Hey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The Thief's Downfall. Washes away all enchantments. Can be deadly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You don't say.  Just out of interest... is there any other way out of here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What the devil are you all doing down here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We need him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Is this your doing, Griphook? You have no rights here anymore. When you gave up your keys, you --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Imperio!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Well done.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No. It's not possible...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell. That's a Welsh Green.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It looks like it's been down here forever.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's been trained to expect pain when it hears the noise.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's barbaric. I...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We'll only have a few seconds. In other words... they'll be no do-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Ready, Bogrod?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hm? Oh. Yes. Of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Lumos !

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Lumos !

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Lumos !

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Blimey...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Look.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No wonder Bellatrix thought it was real.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Is it here, Harry? Can you feel anything?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's hot! All eyes turn to the bowl, WOBBLING MADLY on the floor, when... it SPLITS APART and begins to MULTIPLY.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Ron, your foot!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We'll be crushed! Hurry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's it. Up there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How're we going to reach it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Give me the sword! The real one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Keep going!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Behind you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The cup!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: In here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We have a deal, Griphook.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I said I'd get you in. I never said anything about getting you out.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Griphook! Griphook!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Thieves! Help! Thieves!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Foul little git. Least we've got Bogrod.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's unfortunate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We can't just stand here! Who's got an idea?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You're asking us? You're the brilliant one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I've got something. But it's mad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Relashio!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's your idea?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Come on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It doesn't realize it's free!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That was brilliant! BRILLIANT!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We're dropping!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I say we jump!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: When?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The boy has discovered our secret, Nagini. We must find out just how much he knows. We must return to our hiding places and see if the others are safe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He knows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How is it you --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I saw him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You let him in! Harry, you can't --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I can't always help it, Hermione!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Never mind! What did you see?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He's angry. But he's scared too. He's going to make sure the other Horcruxes are safe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What happens when he finds out four are gone?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I reckon he'll do anything to stop us from finding the rest. There's more: one of them's at Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You saw it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Tonight? But we have to plan. We have to figure out what --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Honestly, Hermione, when have any of our plans actually worked? We plan, we get there and all hell breaks loose.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: 'Fraid he's right. One problem: Snape's Headmaster now. We can't just walk in the front door.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We'll go to Hogsmeade. To Honeydukes. Take the secret passage in the cellar.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: There's something wrong with him. In the past, I could always follow his thoughts. Now everything feels disconnected.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Maybe it's because of the Horcruxes. Maybe he's growing weaker. Maybe he's dying.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No. It's more like he's wounded. If anything, he feels more

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: They were ready for us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We know you're here, Potter. There's no getting away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps you need some convincing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What's he mean by that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No, you'll give us away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Expecto Patronum!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: In here, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Did you get a look at him! Fora second I thought it was --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Harry! I can see you! In here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You bloody fools! What were you thinking coming here? Do you have any idea how dangerous it is --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You're Aberforth.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore's brother. It's you I've been seeing -- here. It's

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Where've you left him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: He's dead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Sorry to hear it. I liked that elf.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Mundungus Fletcher, 'bout a year ago.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Dung had no right selling you that. It belonged to --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Sirius. Albus told me. He also told me that you'd likely be hacked off if you ever found out I had it. But ask yourself where you'd be if I didn't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Right then. Reckon you're hungry. Let's get you fed, then think of the best way to get you out of here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Do you hear much from the others? From the Order?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The Order is finished. You-Know- Who's won. Anyone who says otherwise is kidding themselves.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We need to get into Hogwarts. Dumbledore gave us a job to do.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Did he now? Nice job? Easy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We've been hunting Horcruxes. We think the last one's in the school. But we'll need your help getting in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: If we can find it and kill it, then we kill him, and then we can end this war once and for all. We need to get into Hogwarts tonight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's not a job my brother's given you, it's a suicide mission. Do yourself a favor boy. Go home. Live a little longer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore trusted me, to see this through.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Why should he...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Keep secrets? You tell me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I only care about the Dumbledore I knew. I trusted him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Did you now? And why is that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I had no reason not to —-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's a boy's answer. A boy who goes chasing Horcruxes on the word of a man who won't even tell him where to start. You're lying. Not just to me, which doesn't matter, but to yourself as well. That's what a fool does.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You're drunk.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You don't strike me as a fool, Mr. Potter. So I'll ask you again. There must be a reason. Why do you trust anything my brother ever said to you? Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You know what to do...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Where've you sent her?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You'll see soon enough.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's Ariana, isn't it? Your sister. She's beautiful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: She'll always be beautiful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: She died very young, didn't she.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: My brother sacrificed many things, Mr. Potter, in his journey to find power, including her. She was devoted to him -- he gave her everything, but time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Dumbledore... thank you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Did save our lives twice. Kept an eye on us in that mirror. That doesn't seem like someone who's given up, does it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: She's coming back! And she's got someone with her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Who's that with her? Bloody hell...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I knew you'd come! I told them alii! Harry Potter would never abandon Hogwarts!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Neville, you look...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Like hell? I reckon. This is nothing. Seamus is worse. You'll see. Hermione! Ron!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hey, Ab. There might be a couple more people on the way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Well? Ready?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I don't remember this being on the Marauder's Map.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's because it never existed till now. The seven secret passages were sealed off before the start of the year. This is the only way in or out now. The grounds are crawling with Death Eaters and Dementors.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How bad is it, Neville? With Snape as Headmaster.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hardly ever see him. It's the Carrows you have to watch out for.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The Carrows?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Brother and sister. They're in charge of discipline. Like punishment, the Carrows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: They did that to you? But why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Today's Dark Arts lesson had us practicing the Cruciatus Curse. On First Years. I refused. Hogwarts has changed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Aw, c'mon. Don't be grim. We're all used to it by now. And the thing is, it helps when people stand up, gives everyone hope. I used to notice that when you did it, Harry. C'mon, we're almost there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Let's have a bit of fun, shall we?  Hey! Listen up, you lot! I've brought you a surprise!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Blimey.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Get the word out to Remus and the others that Harry's back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: River, DA calling. Do you read? We have a new weather report: Lightning has struck. I repeat, lightning has struck...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Okay, okay! Stand down! lLet's not kill them before You-Know-Who gets the chance!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Okay. There's something we need to find, something hidden here in the castle. It could help us defeat You-Know-Who.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We don't know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Where is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I realize it's not much to go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That's nothing to go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I think it might have something to do with Ravenclaw. It would be small, easy to conceal, valuable. Any ideas?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Well, there's Rowena Ravenclaw's lost diadem.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: The lost diadem of Ravenclaw? Hasn't anyone ever heard of it? It's quite famous.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Yes, but Luna, it's lost. For centuries now. There's not a person alive today who's seen it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me. But would someone tell me: what's a bloody diadem?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's a kind of crown. You know, like a tiara.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Ravenclaw's was rumored to have magical properties, to enhance the wisdom of the wearer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Hey there. Ron smiles, about to speak, then notices Ginny's eyes have not left Harry. He frowns, speaks to Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Six months she hasn't seen me and it's like I'm Frankie First Year. I mean, I'm only her brother.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Got loads of those, though, doesn't she? There's only one Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Shut up, Seamus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: What is it, Ginny?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Snape knows. He knows that Harry was spotted in Hogsmeade.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Put a smile on, Miss Reynolds. Wouldn't want me to have to pay a visit to Daddy again, would you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Many of you are surely wondering why I have summoned you here at this hour. It has come to my attention that earlier this evening... Harry Potter was sighted in Hogsmeade.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I mention this in the hopes that truth will not be supplanted by

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: For myself and a few select members of the staff this comes as little surprise. We have, for some time, considered Mr. Potter's return to Hogwarts to be not only possible but inevitable. Consequently, in the past several months and under my specific direction, exhaustive defensive strategies have been employed to defeat any attempt Mr. Potter might make to breach these walls. But know this. Should anyone -- student or staff -- attempt to aid Mr. Potter, that person will be punished in a manner consistent with the severity of their transgression. Rest assured: So long as I am Headmaster at Hogwarts, Harry Potter will never again step foot in this castle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Now then. If anyone here has knowledge of Mr. Potter's movements this evening... I invite them to step forward now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I think I can help you out with that... -.. Harry appears.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And I'm afraid it's rather extensive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: How dare you stand where he stood.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Tell them how it was that night. Tell then how you looked him in the eye, a man who trusted you... and killed him. Tell them!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I'm a Gryffindor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I know that many of you will want to fight. Some of you may even think this wise. But this is foily.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I wish you no harm. TI have great respect for the students of Hogwarts. I was once one myself after all. I ask for but one thing and if granted no magical blood shail be spiit...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Give me Harry Potter. Do this and none shall be harmed. Give me Harry Potter and I shail leave Hogwarts untouched. Give me Harry Potter and you will be rewarded.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: But he's there! Potter's there! Someone grab him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Students out of bed! Students in the corridors!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Sorry, mum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Right away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Time. As much as you can give me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Is that possible, Professor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I think you're right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You, too, Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Let me get this straight, Professor. You're giving us permission to do this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: To blow it up. Boom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Wicked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I can bring 'er down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You realize, of course, that nothing we do will be able to keep out You-Know-Who indefinitely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: That doesn't mean we can't hold him up.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Protego Maxima... Finato Duri... Repello Inimicum...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Harry, Hermione and I have been thinking. It doesn't really matter if we find the Horcrux.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Unless we can destroy it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: So we were thinking --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You were thinking. It's Ron's idea. And it's brilliant.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You destroyed Tom Riddle's Diary with a Basilisk fang, right? Well, we know where we might find one, don't we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Okay. But take this. That way you can find me when you get back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Where are you going?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Ravenclaw Common Room. Got to start somewhere. Hermione nods, slips the Map in her beaded bag and she and Ron head off. Just before they turn the corner, Ron looks back, holds Harry's glance briefly... and then is

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Wait! I need to talk to

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I'll take him from here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: It's all right. We're going to get you inside.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I kept calling. No one came.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry. I won't leave you. I promise.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You've been so brave, sweetheart.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Why are you here? All of you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: We never left, dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Does it hurt? Dying?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Quicker than falling asleep.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: And he will want it to be quick.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You're nearly there, son.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry. I didn't want any of you to die for me. And Remus, your son...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: You'll stay with me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Until the end.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: Stay close to me.

Harry Potter.text: Always...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
Harry Potter.text: No sign of him, my Lord.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
